228b8(mdo sde): pa'i phyogs gcig pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o// stong pa nyid la bzod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o// 'di la ni sbyin pa'o// 'di la mi sbyin no snyam
229a1(mdo sde): pa'i de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o// 'di la ni yin dbu'o// 'di la ni dbul lo// snyam pa de ni byang chub sems
229a2(mdo sde): dpa'i nyes pa'o// 'di la ni chos bshad par mi bya'o// snyam de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o// 'di la ni bsnyen bkur bya'o// 'di la ni bsnyen bkur mi bya'o// /
229a3(mdo sde): snyam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i so so 'byed par byed de/ 'di ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o// 'di ni tshul khrims 'chal
229a4(mdo sde): pa'o// snyam du so sor phye nas/ tshul khrims 'chal po'i nyes par byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sems
229a5(mdo sde): can thams cad la sems mnyam pa dang / chos thams cad la sems mnyam par bya dgos shing / nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba dang / sa dang chu dang me dang rlung
229a6(mdo sde): dang / nam mkha' lta bur snyoms pa'i sems dang / stong pa nyid la bzod pa dang ldan par bya dgos pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' gang sems can gang yang yongasu
229a7(mdo sde): mi gtong ba mi gnas pa'i sems dang / tshad nges par mi byed pas sems can thams cad kyis phyir snying rje bskyed cing byams pa mos par byas te/ khyab par byas
229a8(mdo sde): nas bsgrub te gnas la/ chos rnams la yang stong ngo snyam du bzod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so ba la spyod pa dang spobs pa yin no//
229b1(mdo sde): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang 'khor ba la tshad nges par byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o// bskal pa 'di tsam gyis bar du ni bdag 'khor bar bya'o// /
229b2(mdo sde): bskal pa 'di tsam par du ni 'khor bar mi bya'o// snyam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o// sems can 'di dag snyed cing bdag gis dkrol bar bya'o// /
229b3(mdo sde): sems can 'di snyed cig ni bdag gis dkrol bar mi bya'o// snyam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o// sems can 'di skad cig bdag gis dkrol bar bya'o// /
229b4(mdo sde): sems can 'di snyed cig gis grol bar mi bya'o// snyam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o// 'di ni brtson 'grus so// bdag ni brtson 'grus can no// bla na
229b5(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya par bya'o// snyam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i
229b6(mdo sde): rnam par gnon pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpas 'di ltar go cha bgo bar bya ste/ 'khor ba'i sngon gyis mtha' mi sngon no// zhes ji skad du
229b7(mdo sde): 'byung ba de srid du bdag 'khor ba na 'khor te/ gal te bdag sems can re re'i phyir yang / bskal pa de kho na snyed du 'khor ba na 'khor bar bya dgos par gyur na bdag gi/
229b8(mdo sde): spro bar bya'o// rnam grangs 'di gzhan du sems can thams cad kyis don gyis phyir/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa ji srid pa de srid du 'khor ba dgos na yang bdag spro ste/
230a1(mdo sde): yang brtson 'grus dang / nga rgyal dang / byang chub la mngon par zhen pa spangs la/ mi dmigs pa'i brtson 'grus gis go
230a2(mdo sde): chas spros par bya'o snyam ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' go cha gos pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so pa la slobs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang
230a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dag tu song na/ sems can rnams kyis don nus shing lcogs
230a4(mdo sde): pa 'os yin bzhin du/ de dgon pa'i phyogs dben pa'i cig tu 'dug nas dben pa na spyod cing bsam gtan gyis ro dga' ba dang bde ba rten cing gnas pa de na byang chub
230a5(mdo sde): sems dpa'i nyes pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' gang sbyin par byed pa la/ skyo bar yang med sems kyi dmigs pa la yang mi rten/ nang du yang dag 'jog kyang 'phel/
230a6(mdo sde): bar byed do// bsam gtan gyis ro myang ba yang med mi gnas pa'i bsam gtan yang yin na/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni/ byang
230a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i sgo so so ba la spyod pa dang slob pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyis pha rol tu phyin pa yang spyod pa
230a8(mdo sde): nad chos thams cad stong par shes nas/ 'di la bdag gam/ sems can nam/ srog gam/ gang zag gang yang med do// snyam du shes nas/ bdag nyid du la
230b1(mdo sde): bar bya ba dang / zhi gnas la rnal 'byor du gnas la sems can gzhan phyin ci log tu dmigs pa'i 'dzin 'khris zin pa de dag la stong pa nyid bdag
230b2(mdo sde): med pa'i tshul de mi brjod ston brda' sprod par mi byed pa ni/ sems de'i thabs la mi mkhas pa yin par rig par bya ste/ nyes par byed pa yang yin no// /
230b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyis pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med par shes shing / chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong par shes
230b4(mdo sde): nas 'di la bdag gis/ sems can nam/ srog gam/ gang zag gang yang med do// snyam ste/ de ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos 'di dag lus kyis mngon
230b5(mdo sde): sum du byas ste/ thams cad la mi dmigs pa'i sems dang ldan la sems phyin ci log tu sems shing / dmigs pa can gang yin pa de dag kyang phyin ci log
230b6(mdo sde): tu zin cing dmigs pa'i sems su gyur pa de las rab tu grol bar byas nas/ de dag la yang chos thams cad ngo bo nyid do zhes ston cing / de dag kyang chos
230b7(mdo sde): thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // zhes bya ba la 'dzud par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni thabs mkhas par yin par rig par bya te/ byang chub sems
230b8(mdo sde): dpa'i sgo so so ba la spyod pa dang slob pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
231a1(mdo sde): gser bzangs 'od bshos nas/ 'khor gyis khyams der 'khor de'i nang du byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so ba
231a2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i chos kyis rnam grangs 'di rgyas par bshad do// bcom ldan 'das des chos kyi rnams grangs 'di bshad pa na/ sems can chad med pa dag yang
231a3(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// rigs kyi bu ngas bskal pa las lhag par byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las
231a4(mdo sde): btsams te/ chos stan du zin kyang spobs pa 'am/ chos kyi rnam grangs zad par mi 'gyur mod kyis 'on kyang / de tsam pa tsam bstan pa yin no// rigs kyi bu
231a5(mdo sde): de ltar rgyal po gser mdog des de bzhin gshegs pa de byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dpag tu med pa dang thabs cig tu lo bye ba phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi thams
231a6(mdo sde): cad par bkod pa lta bu dang / bsnyen bkur dang / phu dud bya de lta bus bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ rim gror byas/ mchod par byaso// de nas byang chub
231a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse bas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyal po gser mdog des de bzhin gshegs pa de dang byang
231a8(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' de dag gis gtsug lag khang ma bgyis lags sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gang na bzhugs lags/ de/
231b1(mdo sde): skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs
231b2(mdo sde): pa de dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni rang rang gis sprul pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i nang na gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
231b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse ba la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar lo bye ba phrag bcu rtsa bzhi po de dag 'das pa'i tha ma'i nyen par rgyal po gser 'dog
231b4(mdo sde): gis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la bshos gsol yon phul te slar gshegs par rig nas bsam pa 'di lta bu zhig bsam te/ ci bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba
231b5(mdo sde): 'di brgya byin 'gyur bar yongs su sngo bar bya 'am 'on te tshangs par 'gyur bar yongs su bsngo bar bya 'am/ 'on te 'khor lo bsgyur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir//
231b6(mdo sde): yongs su bsngo bar bya snyam mo// de nas de'i sems bskyed par bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas bzangs 'od des thugs su chud do// de nas de bzhin gabye
231b7(mdo sde): pas rgyal po de'i sems yongs su rtogs pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ rgyal po dang skye bo'i tshogs mang po de dag gis mdun steng gis bar snang la/ de bzhin gshegs
231b8(mdo sde): pa'i sku de kho na bzhin du rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i lus shig sprul te/ de steng gis bar snang de la 'dug nas/ rgyal po gser mdog la tshigs su
232a1(mdo sde): bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so// de na mi ni shes rab 'chal// byis pa'i rang bzhin gyur pa bzhin// rgyal la bsnyen
232a2(mdo sde): bkur byas nas ni/ bya dga' chung ngu gsol bar byed// de bzhin la la sangs rgyas la// bsam gyis mi khyab mchod byas nas// tshangs pa brgya byin
232a3(mdo sde): rgyal po'i srid// dam pa'i gnas la 'dod par bya// rgyal por gyur dang brgya byin dang // de bzhin tshangs par gyur pa rnams// 'di dag mi dag brten
232a4(mdo sde): ma yin/ bsnyen pa yin te 'jig tshul can// srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir// byang chub sems ni bskyed par bgyi// sangs rgyas mkhas rnams kyis//
232a5(mdo sde): de 'dra'i sems ni bsngags pa yin/ rgyal po khyod ni yul 'khor bcas// mchod pa brgya chen byas zin gyis// byang chub sems ni bla na med// brgya chen sems
232a6(mdo sde): ni khyod kyis bskyed// dma' ba'i smon lam ma 'debs shig/ de na byis pa'i spyod yul yin// shes rab bzang po mkhas par gyis// byang chub mchog la 'jug pa
232a7(mdo sde): bgyis// mya ngan la ni 'dod pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas gshegs rnams la// gang gis stong gsum thams cad kyang // rin po che bkang ste phul ba bas// gang gi
232a8(mdo sde): thal mo sbyar byas pa// sems kyi sngon byas la tshig tu brjod pa ma byas kyang // de ni de bas shin tu che// gang gis sems can thams cad la// bskal par bye ba brjod
232b1(mdo sde): med du// sems can kun la snyam byas kyang // de'i bcu drug char mi phod// gang zhig thal sbyar byang chub sems bskyed dang // phyogs bcu dag ni 'jig mdzad
232b2(mdo sde): pa rnam 'dren sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs rnams la// bsod nams 'dod pa'i 'gagos sngon chad kyis// 'khor bar bskal pa byi bar mchod pa bas//
232b3(mdo sde): mi gang mkhas shing mdzad pa'i rang bzhin can// bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan la yid ches shing // byang chub sems ni brten par bskyod nas kyang // bde
232b4(mdo sde): gshegs mchod rten la me tog phul// 'di ni de bas bsod nams khyab brjod na// byang chub sems kyi me tog 'bul byed la// bsod nams snga ma don
232b5(mdo sde): dper mi rung // brgya mtsho dang ni chu'i thig pa bzhin// sangs rgyas zhing 'dir sems can ji snyed pa// bskal ba re re la ni sangs rgyas gyur// bskal
232b6(mdo sde): pa mang por las gzhan mi byed par// bsod nams bshed kyang mtha' mi thugs pa med// de dag byang chub sems kyi rnam par smin// bskal pa mtha'
232b7(mdo sde): yas rab tu bshad pa yang // cung zad tsam yongasu brjod mi 'gyur// sa bzhi dag la rdul ni blangs pa bzhin// de ltar rgyal po skyes mchog khyod kyis kyang //
232b8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis phan yon thos nas// myur du blo gros dma' ba kun spongs la// byang chub phyir ni brgya chen sems bskyed cig/ 'jig rten
233a1(mdo sde): 'dren pa gser gyis mchod sdeng 'o// bsam gyi mi khyab yon tan kun ldan pa// de yis byang chub sems ni rnam par smin//
233a2(mdo sde): 'di 'dra zhes ni phan yon 'di dag bstan// byang chub sems kyis rnam smin bstan pa yis// bsod nams de las gsal te gzugs yod na// zhing rnams gang
233a3(mdo sde): ga'i bye ma snyed gang byas kyang // de dag bkang bas cha tsam zad pa med// rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra thos nas kyang // rgyal po gtso bo'i sems ni dgar 'gyur te//
233a4(mdo sde): sor mo bcu yis thal mo sbyar byas nas// sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal zhes ni tshig tu spras// byang chub phyir ni bdag gis sems bskyed de// bdag ni chos rjes su
233a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'grub par shog/ byang chub rdul bral 'das byas rtog nas// sems can gang ga'i bye snyed bkrol ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas sku des tshig tu brjod nas// de tshe
233a6(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i gtso bo dga' gyur pa// shes nas stong gsum thams cad rab g.yos te// ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin du mkha' las song // rgyal po gser mdog sems
233a7(mdo sde): ni dang 'gyur nas// bu dang bu mo de bzhin chung ma dang // rgyal po dang ni tshong dpon khyim bdag rnams// sangs rgyas la ni phyag 'tshal 'dong zhes pos// bye ba
233a8(mdo sde): brgya phrag drug bcus yongs su bskor cing // me tog rnams dang phrag pa gdug pa thogs// sangs rgyas gang la bar ni gnyi rgyud song // zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas
233a9(mdo sde): ni phyogs gcig 'dug/ de bzhin bu dang bu mo chung ma dang // blon po dang ni tshong dpon khyim bdag dang // rgyal po gzhan dang de bzhin 'khor gyis rnams// de dag
233b1(mdo sde): kyang ni gus par phyag 'tshal 'khod// lha rnams kyis kyang bar snang thams cad khyab// sil bstan dkrol zhing me tog char 'phab pa// gser gyi mdog de
233b2(mdo sde): yul gyis mi bskor nas// thal mo sbyar byas sangs rgyas zhu bar byed// stobs bcu ldan pa dpag med lha'i lha// mi 'dug kha lo bsgyur ba khyod la zhwa// gang gis
233b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems ni brten por bskyed// de'i bsod nams ji tsam skyed 'gyur lags// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar spyod pa spyad bgyis na// bskal par mang por sdug
233b4(mdo sde): bsngal mi mthong bar// nges par bde dang bde blag tshig gyur pas// byang chub bdud brtsi mya ngan med par rtog/ bdag gzhan rka ldag btang yang mi 'chal zhing //
233b5(mdo sde): mgo dang rang sha sAl yang mi 'tshal bar// bdag ni nges par gder gnas spyod pa yin// thabs 'dir thub pas bdag la bstan du gsol// rtag tu bde dang klag ldan
233b6(mdo sde): par shog/ nam kyang bdag lus sdug bsngal ma gyur cig/ byams dang bzod dang dul dang bsdom pa la// gnas nas bdag gis byang chub mchog reg shog// le lo ma/
233b7(mdo sde): mchis rtag tu slab la slob bdag gis bslab pa nams kyang bzhig mi bgyi// 'dren pa bdag ni dam bcas brtan par bgyi// nams kyang tshig tsam lhur lan yongs mi
233b8(mdo sde): bgyi// rang 'byung bsod nams 'bras bu bdag la gsungs// de bzhin gshegs pa theg pa la bde ba gsangs// ji ltar spyad pa'i skabs pa bka' stsal du gsol// thos
234a1(mdo sde): nas ji ltar bstan bzhin gnas par bgyi// gser 'od gser bkod 'od bzangs des gsungs pa// kye kye se'i bdag po
234a2(mdo sde): mnyam par bgyi// bde ba'i rgyu gang bsod nams khyod la bshad// bslab pa'ang bshad kyis de phyir las nyon// gang gis stong gsum rin chen gang byas la/
234a3(mdo sde): stobs bcu mda' ba rnams la 'bul byed pa// de bas byang chub tu ni smin byed pa// bsod nams shin tu mang po 'phel bar 'gyur// gang gis zhing rnams gang
234a4(mdo sde): ga'i bye ma snyed// rin chen gang bas byas nas sbyin pa byin// de bas byang chub tu ni smon byed pa// bsod nams shin tu mang po 'phel bar 'gyur// gang gis
234a5(mdo sde): bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig tu// sems can thams cad la ni mchod pa byed pa// de bas byang chub tu ni smin byed pa// bsod nams shin tu mang po 'phel bar
234a6(mdo sde): 'gyur// gal te sems can thams cad dgra bcom gyur// ye shes dbang thob gyur pa de dag la// bsod nams 'dod pa'i gang zag la la zhig/ bskal ma
234a7(mdo sde): bye ba khrag khrig mchod pa byed pa la// gang gis snying rje bskyed nas byang chub tu// brgya chen sems ni bskyed par 'gyur te// sems can la la gang gis byang
234a8(mdo sde): chub tu// sems kyi gtso bo bskyed par byas nas kyang / gom pa bdun na po ba'i bsod nams 'di// de bas khyab par 'phags par 'gyur ba yin// gal
234b1(mdo sde): te sems can mtha' dag sangs rgyas te// spobs pa mtha' yas ldan pa nyid gyur la// ji ltar sngon gyi 'khor ba'i bskal pa'i bar// sems can cig
234b2(mdo sde): bus mchod pa byas pa dang // mkhas pa'i mi ni gang yang rung ba yis// byang chub mchog tu sems ni bskyed nas kyang // me tog cig pu phul ba'i bsod
234b3(mdo sde): nams 'dis// de bas khyad par 'phags par 'gyur ba yin// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang por ni// bsod nams de'i bshad pa tsam byas kyang //
234b4(mdo sde): bsod nams 'bras bu de'i bshad pa ni// nams kyang zad par 'gyur ba ma yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
234b5(mdo sde): gser bzangs 'od des// rgyal po gser mdog de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po ches gcig dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' ses
234b6(mdo sde): dpa' chen po myur du theg pa bde bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya par 'gyur la// sdug bsngal ba dang / yid
234b7(mdo sde): mi bde bar mi 'gyur ro// chos gcig po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bag yod pa ste/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pa ni myur du bla na med pa
234b8(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya par 'gyur ro// de la bag yod pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bslab pa yongs su mi btang
235a1(mdo sde): ba dang / dam bcas pa las mi nyams pa dang / sems can thams cad la byams pa gnas pa dang / seMs
235a2(mdo sde): can thams cad yongs su mi btong ba dang / byang chub la 'dug pa rten pa dang / brtson 'grus mi gtong ba dang / dge ba'i gshes bsnyen rnams la bsnyen
235a3(mdo sde): bkur byed pa dang / chos la gus pa dang / thos pa mang pos mchog mi shes pa dang / gzhan dag la chos kyis bsgo sha byed pa dang / zang zing med par
235a4(mdo sde): chos bston pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa rnams mi gtong ba dang / 'dod pa nyung ba dang / mchog shes pa dang / nga rgyal
235a5(mdo sde): bcom pa dang / chos nyan pa la rna ba blags te nyan pa dang / bla ma la gus pa dang / bzod pa la gnas pa dang / gnod sems kyi tha ba'i nyes pa dang /
235a6(mdo sde): rnam par spangs pa dang / zab mo stong pa nyid chos la mos pa dang / dmigs pa lta thams cad rnam par spangs pa dang / nang du yang dag par 'jog la
235a7(mdo sde): 'dun pa drag po dang ldan pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la mi g.yal ba dang / 'du shes zlog pa dang / bre mo'i gtam rnam par spong ba dang /
235a8(mdo sde): lus sems dben par gnas pa dang / dgon par gnas pa dang / sems mnyan pa dang / tshul khrims mchog tu mi 'dzin pa dang / bdag la mi
235b1(mdo sde): ston pa dang / gzhan la mi spong ba dang / 'gyod pa thams cad las nges par 'byung bar byed pa dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / dge sbyong gis tshul
235b2(mdo sde): rgyun tu dga' ba dang / bzod par smra ba dang / bzhin khro gnyer med pa dang / chos thams cad bskyed pa med pa dang / 'gags pa med pa la 'dzud pa dang /
235b3(mdo sde): chos thams cad na mkha' dang 'dra ba rtog pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bag yod pa zhes bya'o// rgyal po chen po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i bag
235b4(mdo sde): yod pa ni 'di lta ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang / dmigs par lta ba'i sems can tha na rmi lam du yang yod la mi byed pa ste/ rgyal po
235b5(mdo sde): chen po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bag yod pa'o// rgyal po chos bzhi dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
235b6(mdo sde): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ mgo bo dang rkang lag dang / mig yan lag dang / sha dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang dang tshil
235b7(mdo sde): dang / mdog dang / lpags pa dang / lus thams cad yongs su gtang mi dgos par bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bar 'gyur/ theg pa bde bas
235b8(mdo sde): kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rgyal po chen po 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
236a1(mdo sde): ni dge ba'i chos yongs su btsal ba la/ yid ma rten pa yin te/ de na dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci bskyed kyang rungs te/ de
236a2(mdo sde): la rten por gnas shing / zhum pa med pa'i sems dang ldan la theg pa chen po la shin tu rten no// rgyal po chen po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni tshul khrims kyi
236a3(mdo sde): phung po shin tu yongs su dag pa/ 'phags pa dang / mkhas pas sngags pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis yongs su zin pa dang / ldan
236a4(mdo sde): pa yin te/ des ni bdag nyid tshul khrim la gnas par rig par gnas nas/ chos kyi dga' ba nyams su myong ngo // rgyal po chen po gzhan yang byang chub sem
236a5(mdo sde): dpa' ni byams pas gnas dang / bsam gtan rten pa dang / mi gnas pa'i bsam gtan pa yin te/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin la
236a6(mdo sde): gnas shing / mi gnas pa yid la byed pa dang / sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i bde bar gnas pa ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i bde ba'i rnam
236a7(mdo sde): pa gzhan med do// rgyal po chen po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni ji lta ba bzhin du chos la rtog par yin te/ de ltar ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rtog ste// /
236a8(mdo sde): 'du byed kyi rnam pa 'di dag thams cad ni stong pa ste/ 'di la bdag gam/ sems can nam/ srog gam/ gang zag gam/ yongs su gtong ba yang yin pa 'am/
236b1(mdo sde): yongs su gtong ba gang yin pa 'am/ len pa gang yin pa 'am/ bzod par byed pa gang yin pa 'am/ gang la bzod par bya ba 'am/ bzod par bya ba gang yin/
236b2(mdo sde): pa 'am/ brtson pa gang yin pa 'am/ gang gis phyir rtsom pa 'am/ bsam gtan byed pa gang yin pa 'am/ bsam gtan du bya ba gang yin pa 'am/ sgom par
236b3(mdo sde): byed pa gang yin pa 'am/ sgom par byed pa gang yang med do// snyam mo// de de ltar ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa na/ 'dus byas kyis chos thams cad rang bzhin
236b4(mdo sde): gyis stong par rig nas/ dmigs par lta ba la ga la yod par mngon par zhen pa med la/ bde bar yang gnas te/ rgyal po chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang
236b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' chen po ni bde ba thams cad dang ldan par myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// rigs
236b6(mdo sde): kyi bu de ltar rgyal po gser mdog des bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu ri ba yi chos kyi sbyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa de la phul nas/ bcom ldan 'das de
236b7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzangs 'od de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la blo
236b8(mdo sde): rje ba'i slad du bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// zhes gsol nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// bdag ni
237a1(mdo sde): zhum pa ma mchis sems kyi su// mi mchog spyan sngar tshig 'di gsol bar bgyi// sems can kun la snying rtse bskyed nas kyang //
237a2(mdo sde): 'dren pa rnams ni byang chub sems gzhol bgyi// bdag la nams kyang g.yo rgyu ma mchis te// stobs bcu ldan pas bdag gis bsam pa mkhyen// yon tan
237a3(mdo sde): mnga' ba drang chen 'dra ba ni// lha mi gzhan bdag gis dbang ma mchis// bdag ni sdug bsngal rnams skyabs skyobs pa dang / dpung nyan gyur te sdug bsngal chos
237a4(mdo sde): rnams grol// khyu mchog bdag nyid bde la gnas nas kyang // srog chags rnams ni bdag gis bde la bkod// 'dren pa bde gshegs gsungs pa'i chos gang
237a5(mdo sde): dag/ de la bdag na spyad phyir gnas par bgyi// 'dren pa ji ltar khyod ni lha mis mchod// de ltar bdag kyang mi rnams mchod rten shog/ byang chub thams cad
237a6(mdo sde): mchog ni tshol bgyid cing // bskal pa mang por sbyin pa byin par bgyi// zas skom gos dang shing rta zhon pa dang / gser dngul rin chen du ma sbyin par bgyis// 'dren
237a7(mdo sde): pa bdag ni bslabs la gus par bgyis// de ni ji bzhin yongs su bsrungs par bgyis// nyams par mi bgyid gang la'ang gnas mi bgyid// 'dren pa ni tshul khrim
237a8(mdo sde): dag par bgyid// sems can kun la snyoms pa'i bsams pa yis// srog chags rnams la byams pi sems su bgyid / bkur sti bgyis dang / mtho bar 'gyur dang
237b1(mdo sde): dma' bar 'gyur ma mchis// bskal pa bye ba mang po bsam yas par// bdag ni ji srid sngan chad 'khor bar gyur// mi dpa' khyed la rten nas de srid du// sems
237b2(mdo sde): can gcig gis phyir yang spro bar bgyi// lha mi 'dren pa bde gshegs gsungs pa yi// bsam bde ba de la gnas par bgyi// 'dren pa bsam gtan bde la reg
237b3(mdo sde): gnas shing // rtag tu dgon pa'i gnas par bgyi// bdag gis stong pa nyid la nges par bgyi// lta ba lta ni rten par yongs mi bgyid// dma' ba'i spyod pa rtag tu
237b4(mdo sde): rnam par spang // mchog gis spyod pa dri med sbyangs par bgyi// rigs kyi bu de ltar rgyal po gser gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed ma
237b5(mdo sde): thag pa de'i mod la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so// rgyal bu brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag gis kyang bla na med pa
237b6(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// khyim bdag brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag dang / tshong dpon brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag dang / bu dang bu mo dang chung ma de
237b7(mdo sde): ngag dang // gzhan yang skye ba'i tshogs chen pa de dag dang / lha'i bu brgyang khri ni snang rnams rgyal po gser mdog de'i rjes su srab cing thams cad kyis bla na med sang//
237b8(mdo sde): ba gas pa'i byang chub kyi sems pababyung ngo // rigs kyi du 'di ltar rgyal logs ma dag das bu brgyal por bcug sa/ bcug nas kyang burnams dang / bu bo
238a1(mdo sde): dang rta chung ma rnams dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / rgyal phran rnams dang / lhan cig tu srog chags bye bas bskor
238a2(mdo sde): te dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo // de dag de lta bu byung nas lo khri'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa yongs su byang bar spyad do// rgyal po gser mdog gis
238a3(mdo sde): kyang / mngon par shes pa bsgrubs nas/ mang du thos pa'i mthar phyin par gyur to// byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang bsgrubs po// dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag lhag pa'i bsam
238a4(mdo sde): ba yang dag par zhugs pas des 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur pas sangs rgyas nyid khri mnyes par byas te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams
238a5(mdo sde): cad la yang / na gza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzim cha dang / ba dan dang / snyun gyis gsos sman dang / yo byad kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas nas
238a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyi thad du dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo // rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po gsor mdog du
238a7(mdo sde): gyur pa de gzhan yin snyam du khyod som nyi 'am/ yid gnyis sam/ the tshom za na/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar mi lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa
238a8(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po gser mdog du gyur to// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ tshangs par gyur pa/ bcom ldan 'das
238b1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzangs 'od de la mchod pa'i lam la brtson par gyur pa gang yin pa de'i gzhan zhig
238b2(mdo sde): yin snyam 'am/ khyod som nyi 'am/ yid gnyis sam/ the tshom za na/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar mi lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par rtse ba khyod nyid de'i tshe de'i
238b3(mdo sde): dus nas tshangs par gyur to// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin/ bcom ldan 'das gser bzangs 'od la bsnyen bkur dang rim gro byed par
238b4(mdo sde): spro bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de gzhan zhig snyam du som nyi'am/ yid gnyis sam/ the tshom za na/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyi de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i
238b5(mdo sde): tshe de'i dus na lha'i dbang po brgya byin du gyur te/ byang chub tu sems ma bskyed par mi gnas pa'i sems kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bsnyen bkur byas so// rigs
238b6(mdo sde): kyi bu do'i tshe de'i dus na/ sems can ji snyed kyi rgyal po gser mdog dang lhan cig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed po de dag gi nang nas
238b7(mdo sde): tha na sems gcig kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par ngas mthong ste de dag thams cad ni shes rab che ba dang / brtson 'grus che ba
238b8(mdo sde): sha stag te/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyis chos rnams yang dag par bsgrub shig/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyis zhing tha dad pa
239a1(mdo sde): dag tu mtshan tha dad pa'i de bzhin gshegs par gyur te/ 'jig rten du byung nas thams cad kyis chos kyis 'khor lo bskor
239a2(mdo sde): to// chos kyi 'khor nAs yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyang
239a3(mdo sde): dang byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / 'khor 'dir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus pa gang yin pa 'di mthong / mchod pa byas so// bsnyen
239a4(mdo sde): bkur byas so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis dam pa'i chos kyang bzung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par
239a5(mdo sde): rtse bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de tsam du yun ring du thogs pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par
239a6(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de tsam du bka' ba ni ngo mtshar lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ der srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag de snyed kyis/
239a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang 'od de'i gsungs rab la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
239a8(mdo sde): byang chub tu sems bskyed la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ni ma skyed pa'i slad du'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
239b1(mdo sde): dpa' chen po rnam par rtse ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ khyod ji skad zer ba bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
239b2(mdo sde): byang chub 'di ni yun ring thogs so// bla na med par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa yang dka'o// rigs kyi bu ngas mngon par shes pa/ bcom ldan
239b3(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang 'od de'i sngon rol dang / de'i 'og tu spangs rgyas mang po bye ba khrag khrig 'bum
239b4(mdo sde): dag la nga la ri mo byas/ mchod par byas/ bskur sti byas/ bla mar byas mod kyi/ de srid du ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
239b5(mdo sde): de gzhan du nga 'di snyam sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag de tsam du mdzes shing de tsam lta na sdug pa/ de tsam du snying du sdug pa ni ngo mtshar to snyam
239b6(mdo sde): ste/ de dag la nga'i sdug pa'i sems dang / dga' ba dang gus pa bskyed par zad de/ ngas bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//
239b7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de bas na/ rnam grangs 'dis khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med pa grangs med pa dag
239b8(mdo sde): dang / rang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag dang / nyan thos kyi bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med
240a1(mdo sde): pa dag la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ji ltar mchod pa byas su zin kyang de srid du yang bla na med pa yang
240a2(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems mi bskyed pa dang / de gzhan du na phyis gang gis che/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'dus par gyur pa de'i 'og tu/ bla na med
240a3(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par zad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// dang po dag
240a4(mdo sde): ni don dam gzigs pa dang // grags pa chen po shes rab pha rol son// mi mchog sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dang // bsam yas rnams la gus
240a5(mdo sde): pas mchod par byed// dang por yon tan 'byung gnas rnams mchod kyang // bdag na mkhas pa chos kun shes pa'i mchog/ 'jig rten dag na sangs rgyas gyur
240a6(mdo sde): cig/ de srid du yang sems ni bskyed mi bya// de dag rang sangs rgyas bye ba snyed la yang gus pa bskyed nas mchod par byed// pos kyi mi phyog kha lo bsgyur
240a7(mdo sde): pa rdzogs sangs rgyas gyur ces sems ni de srid bskyed mi byed/ gus pa rgya chen yang dag bskyed nas kyang // dbang du gyur pa bye ba snyed mchod mod kyi// ye shA
240a8(mdo sde): rgya mtsho mi mchog 'dra ba ni// de srid du yang sems ni skye mi byed// don dam gzigs pa rnams kyi gzugs mthong nas// dga' ba'i shugs ni rgya chen bsam
240b1(mdo sde): mi khyab// mkhas pas mi 'dul rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su// gyur ces sems ni de srid skyed mi byed// gang tshe de dag bsod nams rgya chen bsags//
240b2(mdo sde): lus dang yid kyi bden pa na// 'dren pa mi rnams mchog tu gyur cig ces// byang chub don du sems ni bskyed par byed// de dag gis ni bskal ba bye
240b3(mdo sde): ba snyed// bsnyen bkur byas nas bsod nams bstsags nas kyang // sems dge ba dang 'jam zhing mnyen pa yis// de tshe byang chub tu yang sems
240b4(mdo sde): bskyed de// bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa// des ni bdag kyang thams cad gzigs gyur cig/ nams kyang bdag gis smon lamanyam
240b5(mdo sde): ma 'gyur// de dag de skad smon lam 'jug par 'gyur// bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang bsags pa// de ni srog chags thams cad rgal gyur cig
240b6(mdo sde): mi dge la sogs bdag gis gang byas pa// de'i 'bras bu mi zad bdag gi spang // mthu dang brtson 'grus brtan po bskyed nas ni// phyis nas bya
240b7(mdo sde): chub phyogs tu sems kyang bskyed// sems ni nams kyang zhum par ma gyur cig/ dga' ba rgyu chen bsam yas thob gyur cig/ mkhas pa'i som
240b8(mdo sde): la dmigs par mi byed de// byang chub mi dmigs bdag nyid kun mi dmigs// chos 'di nyid mtha' dag stong par shes na ni// de na byang chub sems ni brjed
241a1(mdo sde): mi 'gyur// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
241a2(mdo sde): rnam par rtse bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la byams pa zhes bgyi/
241a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'dis ming 'dis ga las rnyed lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang
241a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu sngon 'byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grang
241a5(mdo sde): med pa bas kyang ches grangs med pa/ yun rings po tshad med pa 'das pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
241a6(mdo sde): rgyas rigs pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyis ston
241a7(mdo sde): pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin chen gdugs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gdugs btsas ma thag tu
241a8(mdo sde): gom pa bdun bor nas gnas gtsang ma'i rigs rnams kyi lha rnams kyis steng du ngar snang la rin po che sna bdun gyis gdugs bzung ngo // rin po che sna bdun/
241b1(mdo sde): des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyis khams thams cad snang bar byas so// der lha rnams kyi kye ma 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che gdugs
241b2(mdo sde): zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// zhes sgra sgrags te/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin chen gdugs zhes bya bar gyur to// de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa
241b3(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gdugs de'i gsung rab la dge slong gros brtan po zhes bya ba tshong dpon gyi rigs las rab tu byung ba zhig
241b4(mdo sde): yod do// rigs kyi bu dge slong blo gros brtan po des bsod snyoms par gyur to// de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gdugs de'i bstan pa la bab
241b5(mdo sde): pa na 'dzam bu gling na grong brgyad khri bzhi stong yod do// grong rdal brgyad khri bzhi stong yod do// yul 'khor brgyad khri bzhi stong yod do// tshong dus brgyad khri bzhi stong
241b6(mdo sde): yod do// dge slong blo gros brtan po de yang grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / tshong dus de dag thams cad du bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu bar/
241b7(mdo sde): gyur la/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ nam srog chags brgyad tshang bar bslang ba'i bzhi lnga 'am bkod kyi bar du bdag gis zan mi za'o snyam mo// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar
241b8(mdo sde): na dge slong blo gros bstan pa de lta bu'i yid dam bcas nas grong dang / grong khyer ram grong rdal las/ yul 'khor ram/ tshong 'dus gang dang gang du bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyang
242a1(mdo sde): de dang der srog chags brgya chang bar slab pa'i bzhi lnga la ma bkod kyi bar du zan mi za'o// rigs kyi bu dge slong blo gros
242a2(mdo sde): brtan po des/ gang gis che nyi ma gcig gis srog chags bslab pa'i bzhi lnga la bkod pa de'i dus dang de'i skabs kyang yod do// gang gis tshe nyi ma gnyis kyi srog
242a3(mdo sde): chags brgya bslab pa'i bzhi lnga la bkod pa de'i dus dang de'i skabs kyang yod do// des zan bcad nas nyi ma gsum pa'i tshe zan bza'o// gang gis tshe nyi ma gsum gyi
242a4(mdo sde): srog chags brgya bslab pa'i bzhi lnga la bkod pa de'i dus dang de'i skabs kyang yod do// nyi ma bzhis srog chags brgya 'tshang bar bslab pa'i bzhi lnga la bkod pa
242a5(mdo sde): de'i tshe de'i dus dang de'i skabs kyang yod do// rigs kyi bu gang gis tshe nyi ma lnga dang / drug dang / bdun gyi srog chags brgya bslab pa'i bzhi lnga la bkod pa de'i dus
242a6(mdo sde): dang skabs kyang yod de/ de zhag bdun gyis bar du zan kyang sems can rnams la snying rje'i phyir sems can rnams la snying rje'i phyir/ sems yongs su mi skyo ste zhag brgyad
242a7(mdo sde): pa'i tshe zan za'o// rigs kyi bu rnam grangs de lta bus dge slong blo gros brtan po des lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems kyis grong khyer chen po
242a8(mdo sde): de dag tu song zhing / grong dang grong khyer dang grong brdal dang / yul 'khor dang / tshong 'dus de dag tu song nas/ sems can bslab pa'i bzhi lnga la bkod do// rigs
242b1(mdo sde): kyi bu dge slong blo gros brtan po des/ lo brgyad khri bzhi stong 'das nas/ srog chags skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang bu mo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum
242b2(mdo sde): phrag sum bcu rtsa drug gi bslab pa'i bzhi lnga la bkod do// rigs kyi bu dge slong blo gros brtan pa 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sems can mang po
242b3(mdo sde): 'di dag bslab pa'i bzhi lnga la bkod zin gyis/ bdag gis 'di dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzung gor ma chag go snyam ste de dag gi zad
242b4(mdo sde): du song nas/ lo bzhi khri nyis stong gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi sngags pa brjod do// chos kyi sngags pa brjod do// dge 'dun gyis sngags pa brjod do// theg pa
242b5(mdo sde): chen po'i sngags pa brjod do// sems can bslab pa'i bzhi lnga la bkod pa gang yin pa'i sems can de dag gis nang du nas lo brgyad khri bzhi stong po gzhan 'das
242b6(mdo sde): pang srog chags bye ba phrag gsum du tshang ba/ gang dag sngon gyis sangs rgyas rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa/ rgya chen po la mos pa de dag bla na med pa yang
242b7(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bcud do// lhag ma dman pa la mos pa rkyen gyis mthu dang ldan pa de dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyis byang chub dang / nyan thos kyis theg
242b8(mdo sde): pa la sems bskyed du bcug go// rigs kyi bu de ltar dge slong blo gros brtan po des 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sems can 'di dag theg pa gsum po la
243a1(mdo sde): mos par byas shing / bdag gis sems can 'di dag bag yod par gnas par bya phyir ting nge 'dzin la gzud pa bstan
243a2(mdo sde): to snyam mo// rigs kyi bu de ltar dge slong blo gros brtan po des yang lo nyi khri mchig stong gis bar du srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum drug bcu po de dag la ting
243a3(mdo sde): nge 'dzin la dmigs pa'i lung phog go/ rigs kyi bu dge slong blo gros brtan pos des srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag sum bcu rtsa drug pa'i sems can
243a4(mdo sde): de dag thams cad ni byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgrub par 'gyur ba de lta bur gdam ngag bstan cing de lta de lta bur rjes su chos ston to// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar dge slong
243a5(mdo sde): blo gros brtan po de dag gi tshe grong du 'gro ba de'i tshe byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'gro'o// de byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/
243a6(mdo sde): grong dang grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ yul 'khor ram/ tshong 'dus su bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'gro ste/ de 'gro ba na sems can byams pa la gnas pa gang yin
243a7(mdo sde): pa de dag thams cad dge slong blo gros brtan po de'i rkang pa sgo'i them pa la bzhag pa'i tshe/ byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par gyur ro// rigs kyi
243a8(mdo sde): bu lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yid ches pa dang / stong pa nyid la mos pa'i khyad par la ltos// de'i phyir dge slong blo gros brtan pa'i rkang pa sgo'i them pa
243b1(mdo sde): la bzhag pa'i tshe/ sems can de dag thams cad byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la ji ltar btsud pa gzhan du byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de
243b2(mdo sde): nas dge slong blo gros bstan po byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam 'phrul de lta bu mthong nas/ sa bla'i lha rnams kyis a la la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
243b3(mdo sde): chen po 'di ni byams par gyur te/ 'di ltar grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal dang yul 'khor dang / tshong 'dus su 'gro ba na sems can rnams byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin
243b4(mdo sde): la snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyir sgra bsgrogs shing skad 'byin par byed do// sa bla'i lha rnams kyis sgra thos nas/ bar snang gi lha rnams kyis sgra bsgrags shing skad phyung
243b5(mdo sde): de/ de dag gis sgra thos rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum gyis lha rnams dang / 'thab bral dang // dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga'
243b6(mdo sde): dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams nas gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams kyi bar du gcig gis gcig tu sgra thos nas a la la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
243b7(mdo sde): chen po 'di ni byams par 'gyur te/ 'di ltar 'di grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / tshong 'dus su song ba na sems can rnams byams pa'i
243b8(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// zhes sgra bsgrags shing skad byung ngo // de'i mig de las yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
244a1(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gdugs de rjes su yid rang bar mdzad do// 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' dge slong blo gros
244a2(mdo sde): brtan po 'di ni srid par 'gro'i 'chi pho dang skye ba thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ mngon par grags par 'gyur
244a3(mdo sde): ro/ byang chub thob pa'i tshe yang 'di'i ming 'di nyid du 'gyur te/ 'jig rten du nyan thos kyis dge 'dun dpag tu med pa dang / rin po che bkod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bde
244a4(mdo sde): ba thams cad dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams 'dus pa'i nang du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa zhes bya bar 'gyuraro//
244a5(mdo sde): zhes lung bstan to// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ dge slong blo gros bstan po zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod som nyi 'am/ yid gnyis sam//
244a6(mdo sde): the tshom za ba srid do/ de tshun chad tshe rabs thams cad du ming 'di lta ste/ byams pa zhes bya ba 'ba' zhig du gyur to// byang chub thob pa'i tshe yang 'di'i ming 'di lta ste/ de/
244a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa zhes bya ba kho nar gyur te/ rigs kyi bu rgyu ni de yin no// rkyen ni de yin te/ de nas byang chub sems
244a8(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la byams pas byams pa zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i sngon du 'byung
244b1(mdo sde): ba 'di bshad ma thag pa de'i mod la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyis khams 'di rnam pa drug du g.yos so// steng gis bar snang la yang lha'i glu dbyangs
244b2(mdo sde): grag so// me tog gi char yang bab po// de nas de'i tshe rgyal po chen po bzhi dang lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi 'jed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / gzhan yang
244b3(mdo sde): lha'i bu 'bum phrag du ma dag gis lha'i me tog man da ra ba dag khyer nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa ga la ba der gtor te/ tshig 'di skad
244b4(mdo sde): du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni skye bo mang po la phan phyir zhugs te/ skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying rtse ba dang / lha dang
244b5(mdo sde): mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgos te/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par sems can bye ba khrag khrig
244b6(mdo sde): 'bum phrag de snyed kyi don byas pa'i phyir ro// sems can gang dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ming tsam thos pa de dag kyang rnyed par
244b7(mdo sde): mchog legs par rnyed pa yin na/ sha'i mig gis mngon sum du mthong nas/ dga' ba thob pa de dag lta ci smos/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
244b8(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bdag cag phyag 'tshal lo// zhes smras so// de nas lha'i bu de dag gis tshig de skad ces spras ma thag de'i mdo la/ skye bo'i chog
245a1(mdo sde): chen po dang bcas/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dag gis tshig 'thun par 'di skad du// byang /
245a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag 'tshal
245a3(mdo sde): lo zhes smras so// chos kyi rnam grangs des brtan pa na srog chags stong khri nyis stong chos mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral bral ba rnam par dag go// dge slong
245a4(mdo sde): la stong la stong ni len pa med pa zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// srog chags stong phrag du ma ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu smin par 'gyur te/ de dag
245a5(mdo sde): kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa'i 'khor/ 'dus pa gnyis pa la dgra bcom pa mngon du byed par 'gyur ro// zhes
245a6(mdo sde): de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bstan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa cig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas
245a7(mdo sde): ba'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
245a8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan
245b1(mdo sde): pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ming byams pa dang po sems bskyed pa zhes bya bar
245b2(mdo sde): zungs shig/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rtse bas zhus pa zhes bya bar gzung shig/ byang chub sems dpa' lung brtan pa zhes bya bar zung shig/
245b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag brgya brtan pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig/ byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so pa zhes bya bar zungs shig/ kun dga' bo chos
245b4(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs gzung ba'i phyir dang / gzhan dag la yang rgyas par yang dag par brtan pa zhes bya ba'i bar gyis phyir khyod la gtad do// kun dga' bo rigs
245b5(mdo sde): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyis khams 'di rin po che sna bdun gyis gang bar byas te/ de bzhin gash+ye
245b6(mdo sde): pa rnams la phul bas ni/ gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang po 'jug pa 'di thos nas/ sems kyi rgyud byang chub gzhog
245b7(mdo sde): ba'i dang / byang chub tu smon pas mos par byed dam/ 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ kun chub par byed dam/ bsgom 'am/ gzhan dag la rgyas par yang dag
245b8(mdo sde): bar smon par byed na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal
246a1(mdo sde): to// mi lus thob pa brnyed pa dka'// sangs rgyas 'byung ba'ang rnyed par dka'/ sangs rgyas dad pa rnyed par
246a2(mdo sde): dka'// byang chub sems kyang rnyed pa dka'// gnas skabs bzhi po 'di dag ni// bskal pa bya ba brnyed dka' ste// de phyir thob nas ma spangs shig
246a3(mdo sde): mthu rtsal dag kyang chud ma gzen// mi lus thob pa rnyed pa dang // sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dang // sangs rgyas dad pa'ang rnyed pa dang // byang chub sems
246a4(mdo sde): ni rnyed gyur na// de phyir brtson 'grus bskyed nas kyang // rtag ta bag ni yod par bgyi// drang srong chen po de dag gis// bag yod pas ni byang chub rnyes// sangs
246a5(mdo sde): rgyas chos rnams thams cad kyis// rtsa ba'i sgo dang tshul gyis lam// bag yod pa dang brtson 'grus yin// mkhas pa rnams kyang 'di la slob// bcom
246a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nA/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rtse ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor
246a7(mdo sde): de dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa
246a8(mdo sde): byams pa 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po phrad nya par ma dang / 'dzin mi tra dang su ran ta bo de dang / zhwa chen
246b1(mdo sde): gyi lo tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sdes la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
246b2(mdo sde): #// rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya rad na ka ran da ka na ma ma hA ya na su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dkon mchog gi za ma tog ces bya
246b3(mdo sde): ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal
246b4(mdo sde): byed kyi 'tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyis kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gos dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' khri dang thabs
246b5(mdo sde): cig tu bzhug so// yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das smig mi'i ldum bu'i 'khor gyi khyams na/ 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis ltas te/ chos ston to// /
246b6(mdo sde): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong dang lhan cig tu/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing
246b7(mdo sde): mdun du bdar te/ smig ma'i ldum bu'i 'khor gyis khyam su ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis
246b8(mdo sde): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig
247a1(mdo sde): rten skyong ba rnams dang lhan cig tu phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'jam
247a2(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das da ltar ci'i mchid cig mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das bka' mchid de nyid kyis rjes su rgyun mi chad
247a3(mdo sde): par mdzad du/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smraso// 'jam dpal da ltar na nyan thos
247a4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas/ 'jam dpal bdag gis khyod la bskul gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid brtsams par slob par gyis
247a5(mdo sde): shig/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ byang chub sems dpa' dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis snod du gyur
247a6(mdo sde): pa ma yin na/ btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' dang ldan pa'i gtam ci dgos// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'dir gang snod du gyur pa 'byung ba de dag khyod
247a7(mdo sde): shod cig/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di na snod du gyur pa ni gang dag yin/ snod du gyur pa ni gang dag yin shes sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras
247a8(mdo sde): pa/ 'jam dpal gyis bdag ni gzhan gyis sgra'i rjes su 'brang ba yin pas/ snod ma yin pa lta ci shes sdod kyis 'on kyang 'jam dpal khyod byang chub sems dpa'
247b1(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i gtam brtsams par spobs par gyis shig/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gang su dag skyon med pa zhugs pa de dag thams cad/
247b2(mdo sde): ni/ sangs rgyas kyis chos rnams kyis snod du ma gyur pa'o// btsun pa rab 'byor gang dag skyon med pa la yang rtog cing sems can rnams la yang lta la/ skyon med
247b3(mdo sde): par yang ma lta zhing / skyon dang yang lhan cig mi gnas pa de dag ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du gyur pa'o// btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang gang dag
247b4(mdo sde): 'tshams la gnas par gyur pa/ slob dang mi slob pa'i chos la zhugs pa/ sems can thams cad la btang snyoms pa/ srid pa la me 'bar ba lta bur blta ba/
247b5(mdo sde): yang yongs su skyob pa/ khams gsum thams cad kyis skrag pa/ skad cig tsam yang srid mngon par grub par mi dga' de dag ni/ sangs rgyas kyis chos rnams kyi
247b6(mdo sde): snod du ma gyur pa'o// btsun pa rab 'byor gang dag phyi ma'i mtha' bskal pa bye bar go cha dgos pa/ srid pa thams cad mi 'jigs mi sdang ba khams gsum spyod
247b7(mdo sde): yul ba/ dri ma gsum dang bral ba/ 'khor ba la skyed mod 'tshal dang / gzhal med khang du 'du shes pa/ srid pa thams cad la chags pa dang bral ba de dag ni sangs
247b8(mdo sde): rgyas kyis chos rnams kyis snod du gyur pa'o// btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang gang dag 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / bag la nyal ba dang / kun tu bkris
248a1(mdo sde): te 'dug pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa de dag ni/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis snod du gyur pa'o// /
248a2(mdo sde): btsun pa rab 'byor gang dag 'dod chags pa yang ma yin la/ 'dod chags spyod par yang ston pa/ zhe sdang gis sdang ba yang ma yin la/ zhe sdang spyod par yang ston
248a3(mdo sde): par+Nagati mug gi rmongs pa ma yin la/ gti mug spyod par yang ston pa/ nyon mongs pa dang yang bral ba/ khams gsum du yang snang ba/ sems can thams cad
248a4(mdo sde): la byams pa/ ma khams pa/ ma zhum pa/ sems can thams cad kyis khur khyer ba/ de bzhin nyid kyis rjes su song ba/ dkon mchog gsum gyis gdung mi 'chad
248a5(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa/ rigs pa gsum dang ldan pa/ rigs pa mngon du gyur pa/ de dag ni/ sangs rgyas chos rnams kyis snod du gyur pa'o// rab 'byor gyis
248a6(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'jam dpal gal te chos kyi dbyings kyang cig/ de bzhin nyid kyang cig/ yang dag pa'i mtha' kyang cig ni/ snod dam snod ma yin de ji ltar mngon// /
248a7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rdza mkhan gyis 'jim pa'i gong bu cig las snod rnam pa sna tshogs byas te/ snod de thams cad so
248a8(mdo sde): gcig ni 'bru mar gyis sdod du 'gyur/ kha gcig spang rtsi kha ra'i snod du gyur/ kha gcig ni ngan pa mi gtsang ba'i snod du gyur te/ 'jim pa'i gong bu de dang / so btang
248b1(mdo sde): la ni tha dang cung zad kyang med do// btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyang cig/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang cig/ ji ltar las mngon par 'du byas la de/
248b2(mdo sde): bzhin du snod kyis khyad par du 'gyur ro// de la sbrang rtsi dang la kha ra'i snod ji lta bzhin du/ byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad la lta'o// 'bru mar dang mar gyi snod ji lta
248b3(mdo sde): ba bzhin du nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la lta'o// ngan mi gtsang ba'i gnod ji lta ba de bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad la lta'o// rab 'byor gyis
248b4(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'jam dpal rnam grangs gang gis gang dag snod du gyur pa de dag snod ma yin par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag snod ma yin pa snod du 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs yod dam/
248b5(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ rnam grangs gang gis na gang dag snod du gyur pa de dag gnod ma yin par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag snod pa de
248b6(mdo sde): dag snod du gyur pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gang la la nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis snod du gyur pa/ bag chags kyis tshams sbyor ba bcom
248b7(mdo sde): pa de dag ni/ sangs rgyas kyis chos rnams kyis snod du gyur pa'o// btsun pa rab 'byor gang dag nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi snod du ma gyur pa/ bag chags kyi 'tshams
248b8(mdo sde): sbyor bcom pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du gyur pa'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor ci yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang gis
249a1(mdo sde): / tshe byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs pa de dag med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa la spyod pa de'i tshe/ snod kyis snying por rig par/
249a2(mdo sde): bya'o// gang gis bzhugs pa dang dbyung ba la spyod pa de'i tshe/ snod chags par rig par bya'o// btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ namakha' ni rtsa dang /
249a3(mdo sde): shing gel ba dang / sman dang nag 'tshal thams cad kyi snod ces kyang bya ba la/ gang gis snod kyang ma yin no// btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
249a4(mdo sde): yang sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad kyis snod ces kyang bya la/ gang gis snod kyang ma yin no// btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sa las skyes pa'i
249a5(mdo sde): shing rnams ni snod na mkha' yin pas rnam par skye'o// btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du lhag pa'i bsam pa las skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang //
249a6(mdo sde): snod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin pas rnam par skye'o// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci byang chub sems dpa' rnam par skye ba 'am/ 'jam dpal
249a7(mdo sde): kyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gal te na mkha' skye na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kying rnam par skye ba zhig na/ na mkha' ni rnam par skye ba 'am/
249a8(mdo sde): yongasu rnam par skye ba 'am/ yongs su rnam par mi 'gyur te/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang rnam par skye bar mi 'gyur/
249b1(mdo sde): yongasu nyams par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnam par skye bar mi 'gyur/ yongs su nyams par yang mi
249b2(mdo sde): 'gyur zhes bya ba ci las btsams te de skad ces smras pa/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nyon mongs pa rnam par skye bar yang mi 'gyur/ sangs rgyas rnams
249b3(mdo sde): las kyang yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal nyon mongs pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la tha dad du bya ba
249b4(mdo sde): ci yod/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor nyon mongs pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyis chos rnams tha dad du bya ba ni cung zad kyang med do// /
249b5(mdo sde): btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab la 'od kyi reg na gzugs thams cad 'di lta ste/ gser gyi kha dogs cig par 'gyur ro//
249b6(mdo sde): btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du shes rab dang / ye shes kyi snang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyang / 'di lta ste/ nga sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi
249b7(mdo sde): kha dogs cig por 'gyur ro// btsun pa rab 'byor de bas na shes rab dang / ye shes kyi snang byas pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyis
249b8(mdo sde): chos rnams la tha dad cung zad kyang med de/ de bas na chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyis chos zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir na
250a1(mdo sde): chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor ji
250a2(mdo sde): lta ba bzhin du rtog pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji lta ba bzhin zhes bya bas/ ci zhig bstan par 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis
250a3(mdo sde): smras pa/ thog ma ji lta bar tha mar yang de bzhin nyid las phyir mi ldog pas/ de'i phyir ji lta ba bzhin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal thogs
250a4(mdo sde): ma dang tha ma zhes bya bas/ ci zhig la bstan par 'gyur// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ thog ma ni stong pa nyid/ tha ma ni dbyen pa nyid de/ de bas na thogs ma dang tha ma
250a5(mdo sde): zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal stong pa nyid dang dben pa nyid dang dben pa la tha dad du dbye ba ci yod// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab
250a6(mdo sde): 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ gser dang sa le sbram la tha dad du bya ba yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal ming du brtags pa ni tha dad pa yod do// 'jam
250a7(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid dang / dben pa nyid 'di ni ming dang brda' tsam du zad de/ ming dang brda' la mkhas pa rnams
250a8(mdo sde): mngan pa med kyis byis pa rnams mngon par zhan to// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal byis pa rnams ni mtshan nyid ji lta bu mkhas pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ji lta
250b1(mdo sde): bu yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das kyis byis pa ni las kyi mtshan nyid do// mkhas pa ni chos kyi mtshan nyid do// zhes gsung
250b2(mdo sde): so// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal las kyis mtshan nyid ji lta bu yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor bstan cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i
250b3(mdo sde): mtshan nyid ni las te/ de la gang dag mngon par 'du byed pa de dag ni yod par mngon no// de la byis pa rnams ni mngon par 'du byed pas de dag gis yod par mngon no// mkhas
250b4(mdo sde): pa rnams ni mngon par byed pas/ de dag gis ni mang bar mngon te/ de la gang yod pa dag/ gang med pa'i dbus de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo// 'phags
250b5(mdo sde): ba'i spyod yul gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa ma yin pa rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'phags pa zhes bya bas ci zhig bstan
250b6(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'phags pa zhes bya ba de ni rdul ci nyon mongs pa med pa la yang dag par 'du ba'i bzhi'o// rab 'byor gyis spras
250b7(mdo sde): ba 'jam dpal rnam grangs gang gis chos thams cad rdul med cing / nyon mongs pa med pa la 'du bar 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs yod dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun
250b8(mdo sde): pa rab 'byor yod do// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ rnam grangs gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ brgya mtsho chen por chu
251a1(mdo sde): thams cad yang dag par 'du zhing de yang 'di lta ste/ lan tshe'i ror ro cig go// btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams
251a2(mdo sde): cad rdul med cing / nyon mongs pa med pa yang dag par 'dra zhing de yang 'di lta ste/ rnam par grol ba'i ror ro cog go/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal las
251a3(mdo sde): rnam par thar par bya ba'i phyir rnam par grol ba ston/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang yod na 'ching bar 'gyur/ rab 'byor
251a4(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal mi shes pa yod na 'ching bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa rab 'byor de bas na mi shes pa la rnam par thar par bya ba'i phyir rnam par grol ba ston to//
251a5(mdo sde): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos thams cad la dad par bya ba med na shes pa 'am/ mi shes par ji ltar bstan/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab
251a6(mdo sde): 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dpyid kyis gasros pa'i chu la ni dro ba zhes bstan do// chu de nyid grangs pa'i dus su ni grangs pa zhes stan te/ chu de la ni tha dad du bya ba
251a7(mdo sde): cung zad kyang med do// btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pas sros pa'i sems la ni mi shes pa zhes bstan te/ de la nang gis byed pa
251a8(mdo sde): skyes bu de'i shes pa 'am/ mi shes par bstan pa ni gang yang med do// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal don de ni rtogs par dka'o// 'jam dpal gyis spras
251b1(mdo sde): pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gnyis la spyod pa rnams kyis so// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal gyis don de ni mngon par dka' ba'o// 'jam dpal gyis
251b2(mdo sde): smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi mig dang bral ba rnams kyis so// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal don de ni shes par bting dpag dka' ba'o// /
251b3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gting ma rnyed pa rnams kyis so// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal don ni shes par dka' ba'o// 'jam dpal
251b4(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor lhag pa'i nga rgyal can rnams kyis so// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal don de ni go bar dka' ba'o// 'jam dpal gyis
251b5(mdo sde): smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag dang bral ba rnams kyis so// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal don de ni mos par dka' ba'o// 'jam
251b6(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor kun bzhi la dga' ba rnams kyis so// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal don de ni rtag mi nus so// 'jam dpal
251b7(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ 'di ltar der ni mtshan ma kun tu mi 'byung ngo // rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal gyis don de ni rtog ge'i spyod pa ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis
251b8(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'di ltar de la so sor rnam par rig pa med do// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal don de ni mchog tu 'phags pa'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
252a1(mdo sde): 'di ltar de ni bsngo ba'i 'du shes dang bral ba'o// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal don de ni mkhas pa dang 'jang
252a2(mdo sde): pas rig pa'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 'di ltar de ni bdag nyid kyis rig pa'o// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas
252a3(mdo sde): gang don du na/ don de ni don ma yin pa'o// zhes de skad bshad pa tshig de'i dgongs pa'i tshigs bshad ji lta bu yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor
252a4(mdo sde): don ces bya ba ni brjod du med pa'i don to// de la gang dag brjod du yod pa'i don la spyod pa de dag gis don ma yin te/ de bas ni bcom ldan 'das kyi don du na/ don ni
252a5(mdo sde): don ma yin pa'o// zhes de skad ces bka' stsal to// gzhan yang btsun pa rab 'byor don ces bya ba ni dben pa'i don to// de la gang dag lus dang ngag dang / sems
252a6(mdo sde): mtshungs pa ldan pa'i don la spyod pa de dag gis don ma yin te/ de bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis don du don ni don ma yin pa'o zhes de skad bka' stsal to// rab 'byor
252a7(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos thams cad la chos ma yin pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis don ci las dgongs te skad bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gyis
252a8(mdo sde): smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das kyis rnams grangs gzigs dang 'dra bar shes pa rnams kyis chos nyid kyang spangs par bya na/ chos ma yin pa lta ci smos
252b1(mdo sde): shes de skad bka' stsal te/ gang spangs par bya ba de na chos dang chos ma yin pa zhes mi bya'o// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam
252b2(mdo sde): kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thams cad ni chos ma yin pa'o zhes de skad bka' stsal to// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa
252b3(mdo sde): bshad pa 'di thos nas/ mi skrag mi dngang dngang par mi 'gyur ba ni ngo 'tshar to// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ brgya la
252b4(mdo sde): seng ge'i phru gus seng ge'i sgra thos nas skrag dngang ngam/ dngang bar 'gyur ram/ ngang pa'i rgyal po'i phru gu na mkha'i dkyil na 'phur pa na ngang pa'i sgra thos nas/ skrag gam
252b5(mdo sde): dngang ngam/ dngang par 'gyur ram/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/ seng ge phrag rang gi sgra dang / ngang pa'i rgyal po phru gu rang gi spod yul
252b6(mdo sde): gyis mi nag go/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang gdung las skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin nyid dang /
252b7(mdo sde): stong pa nyid las nges par 'byung ba de rnams ni/ chos thams cad dang / sgra thams cad dang / bshad pa thams cad kyis mi skrag dang mi dngang par mi 'gyur mod kyi/ btsun pa rab
252b8(mdo sde): 'byor 'on kyang gang yod na skrag par 'gyur shes sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'jig tshogs la lta ba yod na skrag par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gyis smras
253a1(mdo sde): pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'jig tshogs la lta ba de byang chub sems dpas yongs su shes te/ de bas na chos thams
253a2(mdo sde): cad mi skrag go/ de sgra thams cad kyis mi skrag mi dngang par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' 'jig tshogs
253a3(mdo sde): la lta ba yongs su shes na de ji ltar 'bras bu thob/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' ni 'bras bu thob pa/ 'dod pa'i
253a4(mdo sde): phyir 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes na/ de ji lta ji ltar 'bras bu thob pa la btang snyoms su bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyis chos thob par 'dod pa'i phyir/ sems
253a5(mdo sde): can thams cad la snying rje chen pos sbyor ba'i sems 'jig tshogs lta ba yongs su shes te/ de bas na 'bras bu mi thob po/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal
253a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i thabs gang gis byang chub sems dpas 'jigs tshogs la lta ba yang yongs su shes la/ 'bras bu yangs mi thob pa de ni thabs chen po yin no//
253a7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyis dbyings ni thabs dang shes rab kyis yang dag par zin pa ste/ de bas na
253a8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de'i 'jigs tshogs lta bas yongasu shes la/ 'bras bu yang mi thob bo// btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ skyes bu chen po zhig gis mtshon cha rnon po
253b1(mdo sde): shing sa la chen po bcad nas ril gyis chad bzhin nyin na 'dug go/ mi 'gyel lo// btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyis dbyings kyang
253b2(mdo sde): thabs dang shes rab kyis yang dag par zin te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' de 'jigs tshogs la lta ba yang yongs su shes la 'bras bu yang mi thob po// btsun pa
253b3(mdo sde): rab 'byor gang sa la chen po de cher chen po bab ste/ gsher cing brlan par gyur na slar yang skye zhing yal ga dang me tog dang / 'bras bu dag kyang 'byung la/ gang sems
253b4(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi nye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dus dang de lta bu'i skabs kyang yod do// btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen pos gsher cing
253b5(mdo sde): brlan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes la/ khams gsum du yang skye zhing / gang sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho bar
253b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ba/ che dang rig dang / skye ba yang ton par byed do// btsun pa rab 'byor gang shing sa la chen po de la rlung chen po'i shugs kyi phul nas la ltung bar 'gyur
253b7(mdo sde): ba de lta bu'i dus dang / de lta bu'i skabs kyang yod do// btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du ye shes chen po'i rlung gis shugs kyis phul na byang chub sems dpa'
253b8(mdo sde): byang chub kyi snying po 'gog par ltung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa legs so zhes bya byin te/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis byang
254a1(mdo sde): / chub sems dpa' rnams kyis thabs dang shes rab kyis yang dag par zin pa'i ye shes dbyings dang / byams pa
254a2(mdo sde): chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa de ni legs par bshad de/ leg so leg so// 'jam dpal 'on kyang dpe gang dag bstan pas byang chub
254a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' thabs dang / shes rab shes par 'gyur ba'i dpe ngas kyang bstan gyis nyon cig/ 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ klu'i rgyal po mthu dang ldan pa
254a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i dbang gis sprin gyis phung po gcig las char ba'i bdag nyid klog gis 'phreng ba yang gtod do// skye bar byed pa'i bdag nyid chu rgyun yang stong ngo //
254a5(mdo sde): 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thabs dang / shes rab dang / ye shes kyis sprin cig las sems can so so'i skye bo rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir// /
254a6(mdo sde): byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis spyod pa yang ston to// gdul bar bya ba'i sems can rnams gdul ba'i phyir/ 'phags pa thams cad kyi spyod pa yang ston to// /
254a7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po gangs ri la dri'i shing zhig yod de/ de'i rtsa ba'i dri yang gzhan/ sdong po'i dri yang gzhan/ yal ga'i dri yang gzhan/
254a8(mdo sde): lo ma'i dri yang gzhan/ me tog gi dri yang gzhan/ 'bras bu'i dri yang gzhan no// 'jam dpal de bzhin du dri'i shing lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus de'ang sems/
254b1(mdo sde): can rnams ji ltar mos pa bzhin du so so ci rigs chos kyi dri stong ste/ snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba'i de las kyang mi g.yo'o// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ brgya
254b2(mdo sde): byin thogs pa'i nor bu rin po che lha rnams kyis dbang po brgya byin gyis mgul du thogs na/ des sum bcu rtsa gsum gyis gnas thams cad dang / lha rnams kyi
254b3(mdo sde): dbang po brgya byin dga' ba dang / rtse ba'i tshogs thams cad snang yang nor bu rin po che de ni rnam par mi rtog go/ 'jam dpal de bzhin du nor bu rin po che dag pa lta
254b4(mdo sde): ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi dbyings de yang / bya ba thams cad ston la/ thams cad du'ang rnam par mi rtog go/ 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ nor
254b5(mdo sde): bu rin po che yid bzhin du 'gro ba zhig yod de/ de ni sems can thams cad kyis bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par byed kyang nor bu rin po che de ni rnam par
254b6(mdo sde): mi rtog go/ 'jam dpal de bzhin du rin po che lta bur lhag pa'i bsam pa pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongasu
254b7(mdo sde): rdzogs par byed kyang / byang chub sems dpa' de ni rnam par mi rtog go/ 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ na mkha' la me yang 'bar zhing char yang 'bab med/
254b8(mdo sde): namamakha' la tsha ba yang med grang bar 'gyur ba yong med do// 'jam dpal de bzhin du thabs mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang kun tu 'bar ba'i khams gsum na
255a1(mdo sde): yang gnas/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i bzhi pa la mi spyod mod kyi/ tsha ba med grang bar 'gyur ba yang med do// 'jam dpal 'di
255a2(mdo sde): lta ste dper na/ na mkha' la dug gis shing yang skye/ sman gyi shing yang skye mod kyi/ na mkha' la dug gi shing gis nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur/ sman gyi shing gis rnam
255a3(mdo sde): bar byang bar yang mi 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin du thabs mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dug gi shing lta bu'i phung po yang 'chang / sman gyis shing lta bu'i dbang
255a4(mdo sde): po yang 'chang mod kyi/ phung po'i nyon mongs par mi 'gyur/ rnam par dag pa'i dbang pos rnam par byang bar mi 'gyur la/ gnyis ka'i bya ba yang med do// 'jam dpal
255a5(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chu'i snod bu gu brgya yod pa la/ bu gu cig bkag na thams cad nas mi 'jog go/ bu gu gcig phye na thams cad nas kyang 'jog 'jog go/ 'jam dpal
255a6(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par bzhag pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa chen po la yongs su rdzogs par byed kyis/ yul la mi 'jog go// yang langs na 'di
255a7(mdo sde): lta ste/ sems can thams cad so so ji ltar 'os pa chos bstan pa'i phyir/ yul thams cad du zag go/ 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ mchog tu mthu dang ldan pa'i
255a8(mdo sde): rta cang shes na/ rta zhon pa la bsrung bar byed de/ bdag ni de lta ma yin no// 'jam dpal de bzhin du snying rje chen po thob byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu mthu dang ldan pa dag ni/
255b1(mdo sde): sems can rnams la bsrang bar byed de/ bdag ni de lta ma yin no// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rigs kyi rgyal po seng ge ni me 'bar ba ma rtogs par cis
255b2(mdo sde): kyang mi 'jigs so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis sar ltung ba ma rtogs par kyang mi 'jog go/ 'jam dpal 'di
255b3(mdo sde): lta ste/ dben/ ba lang gi rgyal po sa srungs gis bu ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas su rtogs mod kyi/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bsod
255b4(mdo sde): nams brtsegs pa'i phyir dga' ba dang rtse ba'i tshogs thams cad so sor ci rigs par ston to// 'jam dpal de bzhin nyid du byang chub sems dpa' dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song
255b5(mdo sde): yang 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams so so rig par yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi tshogs thams cad ston ton to// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na//
255b6(mdo sde): gang btsu ba bstan las byung ba dang / gang nor bu rin po che las byung ba'i ma gnyis gang yang tsha ba'i bdag nyid do// 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang sem
255b7(mdo sde): dang po bskyed pa dang / gang byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i sems tha ma bskyed pa de gnyis gang yang sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa sreg pa'i bdag nyid do// 'jam
255b8(mdo sde): dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ dri'i shing sna tshogs rnams ni/ de dag thams cad khams bzhis yongs su bzung ste skye'o// 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nas
256a1(mdo sde): du bya bya/ kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs bsags pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub kyi sems yongs su bzung shing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
256a2(mdo sde): du bsngos na skye'o// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i de 'khor rin po che gang du 'gro ba der/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dpung
256a3(mdo sde): gis tshogs thams cad 'dod do// 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang du 'gro ba der/ byang chub sems
256a4(mdo sde): dpa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad 'dod/ 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ bya'i rgyal po ka la ping ka phru gu sgo nga'i sbubs nas 'dug pa nga ma chags cing sgrub nas
256a5(mdo sde): ma byung ba yang 'di lta ste/ sgra yid du 'ong ba ka la ping ka'i sgra nyid sgrogs so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ma rigs pa'i sgo nga'i sbugs pa/ 'jig
256a6(mdo sde): tshogs la lta 'am bcom pa khams gsum nas mngon par ma byung yang / 'di lta ste/ sgra stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du
256a7(mdo sde): bya ba med pa sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sgra nyid sgrogs so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ ka la ping ka'i rma bya'i nang du song na du ka la ping ka'i sgra mi sgrog so//
256a8(mdo sde): ka la bing ka'i nang du song na ni/ ka la ping ka'i sgra sgrogs so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis nang du song na
256b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyis chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sgra mi sgrogaso// byang chub sems dpa'i nang du song na ni sangs rgyas kyis chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sgra sgrog so// /
256b2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ rnam par 'thor ba'i rlung ni 'dzam bu gling gis zhing ngam/ khang pa'am/ gzhal med khang ngam/ sa phyogs rnams kyis bzod par
256b3(mdo sde): mi nus so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyis chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnams yongs su sgrogs pa na/ sangs rgyas byin
256b4(mdo sde): gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis ma rlabs pa'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis mos pa'am/ dad par mi nus te/ gang dag sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis
256b5(mdo sde): brlabs pa de dag ni shing yid ches so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma'i 'od ni gtsang ba dang / mi gtsang ba gnyis ka la char mod kyi/ gtsang ba la rjes
256b6(mdo sde): chags par mi byed/ mi gtsang ba la yang khong khro bar mi byed do/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni gang du'ang brjod par bya ba ma yin no// 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub
256b7(mdo sde): sems dpa'i ye shes kyis 'od zer yang nyan thos dang so so'i skye bo la 'char mod kyis/ nyan thos rnams la rjes su chags par yang mi byed/ so so'i skye bo rnams la/
256b8(mdo sde): khong khro bar yang mi byed de/ byang chub sems dpa' ni gang du yang brjod par bya ba ma yin no// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam shing yongs su 'dul
257a1(mdo sde): brtol gyi lo ma lhag par gyur pa'i tshe/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams ring por mi thogs par shing yongs su 'dus brtol 'di
257a2(mdo sde): ni me tog dang / 'bras bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// snyam nas yid dga' bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin du nam byang chub sems dpa' bdag thams cad yongs su
257a3(mdo sde): btong bar gyur pa de'i tshe ring por mi thogs par byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni sems dpa' 'di ni sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyis chos kyi me tog dang 'bras
257a4(mdo sde): bu dang sbyin par 'gyur ro// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bstod par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ shing gang ga'i rlung gis btud / kun
257a5(mdo sde): tu btud/ rab tu btud pa de dag 'gyel bar 'jigs pa med do// 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal gang dag sems can thams cad la 'dud/ kun tu 'dud/
257a6(mdo sde): rab tu 'dud pa de dag nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis sar ltung bar 'jigs pa med do// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ chu ni gang du dma' ba der 'bab po//
257a7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal de bzhin du nga rgyal med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la der 'gro'o// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ nam brgya mtsho chen po dang po
257a8(mdo sde): gnas pa de'i tshe/ sa chen po thams cad kyi nang du dma' ba'i phyogs der dang por gnas te/ de nas 'bab chu'i rgyun thams cad tshegs chung ngus der mngon du 'bab par 'gyuraro//
257b1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal de bzhin du nga rgyal med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la tshig chung ngus sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper
257b2(mdo sde): na/ nor bu rin po che rdo rjes nor bu rin po che thams cad 'bigs mod/ nor bu rin po che rdo rje su de ni ngag gis mi 'bigaso// 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems
257b3(mdo sde): dpa' nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams 'dul mod kyi/ de dag gis gdul ba der yang mi ltung ngo // 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ me tog man 'da' ra ba
257b4(mdo sde): rlung gis bskyod na/ dpag tshad brgya kho ra khor yug tu dris khyab bo// 'jam dpal de bzhin na byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi bskyod pa yang sems can
257b5(mdo sde): thams cad la byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i dris khyab par byed do// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ gang dag me tog man da ra ba'i dri snom pa de dag ni nad thams
257b6(mdo sde): cad kyi mi 'debs so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i dri snom pa de dag nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad kyis mi
257b7(mdo sde): tshungs par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba med na u dum pa ri'i me tog mi 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub tu sems
257b8(mdo sde): bskyed pa med na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi me tog kyang mi 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ nam klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa char 'bebs de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i
258a1(mdo sde): gling thams cad khyab par char 'beb so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos kyi 'char 'beb so//
