258a2(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyun la mnyam par 'beb so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ mtsho chen ma dros pa las rlung gis rgyun bzhi 'bab ste/ rgya mtsho
258a3(mdo sde): chen po bzhi yongs su 'gengs so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang bsdus pa'i dngos po bzhi 'babs pas/ ye shes kyi nga rgya mtsho chen po
258a4(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po med na 'dzam bu'i gling gis mi rnams nor bu rin po che la spyod par mi 'gyur ro// 'jam
258a5(mdo sde): dpal de bzhin du sangs rgyas 'byung ba med na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par grol ba'i chos rin po che la spyod par mi 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta
258a6(mdo sde): ste dper na/ gzugs gang ci yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad 'byung ba chen po bzhi yongs su bzung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du gang byang chub sems dpa' gang ci yang
258a7(mdo sde): rung ste/ de dag thams cad byin gyis brlabs bzhis yongs su bzung ngo // 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ g.yang sa nyam nga ba na 'dug pa'i sman gyi shing ni skye bo mang
258a8(mdo sde): po'i nye bar mtsho bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin du nyan thos 'khor bas 'jigs pa'i g.yang sa nyam nga bar gnas pa rnams ni skye bo mang po'i nye bar mtsho bar 'gyur//
258b1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ grong khyer gyi nang na 'dug pa'i sman gyi shing ni skye bo mang po'i nye bar mtsho bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin du byams pa chen po dang /
258b2(mdo sde): snying rje chen po'i nang du song ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sems bskyed pas/ sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// 'jam
258b3(mdo sde): dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ gang dbyar chung ba'i mig de dag gis yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin du gang nyan thos rnams kyis chos bstan pa
258b4(mdo sde): de ni yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ gang dpyid byung ba'i chu mig de ni yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal
258b5(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos bstan pa de ni yun ring gnas par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ ri rgyal po gangs ri'i shing
258b6(mdo sde): gang dag bcad pa de dag ni slar yang myur du skye'o// 'jam dpal de bzhin du nam de bzhin gshegs pas bya ba byas te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das
258b7(mdo sde): kyang dkon mchog gsum gyis rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btso/
258b8(mdo sde): ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' yon tan sngags pa tshad ma mchis pa dang ldan pa de dag gis yang dag pa'i yon tan sngags pa 'di lta bu 'di dag
259a1(mdo sde): byabya/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de dag yang dag yon tan
259a2(mdo sde): bsngags pa de dag mthong nas dga' bar mi 'gyur/ rgyags par mi 'gyur ba de'ang mchog tu ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub
259a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' de dag thams cad ni rtsa ba dag pa'i yon tan dang / bsngags pa brjod pas dga' bar mi 'gyur ro// rgyags par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol
259a4(mdo sde): pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtsa ba gang lags/ dag pa gang lags/ bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' rnams
259a5(mdo sde): bdag med pa'i rtsa ba las dag go// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gso ba med pa dang / gang zag med pa'i rtsa ba dang / 'jigs tshogs la lta ba'i rtsa ba dang / ma
259a6(mdo sde): rigs dang / srid pa'i sred pa'i rtsa ba dang / nga dang nga'i zhes bya ba'i rtsa ba las dag go// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das dag pa zhes bgyi bas ci zhig bstan pa/
259a7(mdo sde): lags/ bka' stsal pa ma bzung ma btang ba ste/ de bas na dag pa zhes bya'o// ma skyes ma 'gags ma rtags/ ma phyung ma bcug ma byas rnam par ma byas/
259a8(mdo sde): mun pa ma yin/ snang ba ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ bcings pa ma yin/ thar pa ma yin/ 'khor ba ma yin/ mya ngan
259b1(mdo sde): 'das pa ma yin te/ de bas na dag pa zhes bya'o// gsol ba bcom ldan 'das gal te 'khor ba yang ma lags so// mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma lags/
259b2(mdo sde): na de dag la dag pa de gang lags// bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gang mya ngan las 'das pa yang rlom sems su la 'khor ba la mngon par zhen pa'ang med de nyid
259b3(mdo sde): 'dir dag pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ na mkha' dag pa zhes bya yang ma yin na mkha' ni dag pa ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin te/ 'on kyang nam
259b4(mdo sde): mkha' ni dag pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di bzhin du mya ngan las 'das zhes bya yang / mya ngan las 'das pa ni dag pa yang ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'ang
259b5(mdo sde): ma yin te/ 'on kyang mya ngan las 'das pa dag zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ khyod ci dag pa yin nam/ gsol pa bcom
259b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kun nas nyon mongs ma mchis pa/ de'i tshe dag pa'o// bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i rnam par dag pa gang yin/
259b7(mdo sde): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa ste/ bdag gis de yongs su rtogs pas/ de'i slad du yongs su dag
259b8(mdo sde): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos kyis dbyings yongs su shes par nus sam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
260a1(mdo sde): gal te chos kyis dbyings yongs su ma rtogs par chos gzhan 'ga' zhig mchis na ni/ des chos kyis dbyings yongs
260a2(mdo sde): su 'tshal bar 'gyur gyis/ chos kyis dbyings yongs su mi 'tshal to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te chos kyis dbyings yongs su
260a3(mdo sde): shes pa'i chos de dag gang yang med na chos kyis dbyings de khyod kyis ji ltar yongs su shes/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor cang mi smra ba/
260a4(mdo sde): gyur to// // bam po gnyis pa'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ tshe dang ldan pa cang mi smra bar gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun
260a5(mdo sde): pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i lan glan pa las 'dug par gyur/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang gis tshe sngon bla na med pa
260a6(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma zhugs pa'i tshe kho bo 'dug go/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan thos rnams kyis spobs pa dang bcas pa/ bar chad dang bcas pa'o// /
260a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams spobs pa thogs pa med/ bar chad med pa'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ ci btsun pa rab 'byor chos dbyings la thogs pa 'am/ bar/
260a8(mdo sde): chad gang yang dmigs sam/ smras la 'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/ chos kyi dbyings la ni thogs pa 'am/ bar chad migs so// smras pa 'o na ci'i phyir/ tshe dang ldan
260b1(mdo sde): pa rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings la yongs su tshad yod pa gang yang gyis yongs su shes pa yin gyis/ gang yang chos kyis dbyings la tshad med pa'i tshul gyis yongasu
260b2(mdo sde): shes pa/ de dag ni ma chad pa rab mi 'chad pa'o// smras pa btsun pa rab 'byor ci chos kyis dbyings la yongs su chad pa gang yang yod dam/ smras pa 'jam
260b3(mdo sde): dpal de ni ma yin te/ chos kyis dbyings ni kun gyi sgo te/ chos kyi dbyings la yongs su chad pa gang yang med do// smras pa 'o na ci'i phyir btsun pa rab 'byor chos
260b4(mdo sde): kyi dbyings la yongs su chad par ston/ smras pa 'jam dpal nyan thos kyis yul tshad mar byas te/ chos kyi dbyings yongs su chad par ston to// sangs rgyas kyis
260b5(mdo sde): yul tshad med par byas te/ de ni chos kyis tshad med par ston to// 'jam dpal gyis smos pa/ ci btsun pa rab 'byor chos kyis dbyings yul las byung ngam//
260b6(mdo sde): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyis dbyings yul las chung ba ma yin te/ 'jam dpal de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyis dbyings ni yul med pa/ yul
260b7(mdo sde): dang bral ba'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 'o na ci'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yul tha dad pa ston/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal nyan thos rnams
260b8(mdo sde): kyi spobs pa ni thogs pa dang bcas pa/ bar chad dang bcom pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis spobs pa ni thogs pa med pa/ bar chad pa med pa/ zhes
261a1(mdo sde): dang po nyid du kho bos ma smras sam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor khyod kyis so so yang dag par rig pa
261a2(mdo sde): ma thob bam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal kho bos so so yang dag par rig pa thob po// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 'o na ci'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa
261a3(mdo sde): rab 'byor 'chad pa bar chad/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal nyan thos rnams kyis so so yang dag par rig pa ni sems can gyi dbang po mchog dang /
261a4(mdo sde): mchog ma yin pa shes pa dang bral ba ste/ de bas na chad pa bar chad do// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis so so yang dag par rig pa ni sems can thams cad kyis
261a5(mdo sde): dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin par shes pas bskyed pa ste/ de bas na 'chad pa bar mi 'chad do// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ ci ye shes kyis dbyings gang gis tshe dang
261a6(mdo sde): ldan pa rab 'byor gyis so so yang dag par rig pa'i ye shes bskyed pa'i ye shes dbyings de bar 'chad pa'i mtshan nyid yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal
261a7(mdo sde): de ni ma yin te/ ye shes kyi dbyings ni thogs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid bar chad pa med pa'i rang bzhin can no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
261a8(mdo sde): gal te ye shes kyis dbyings thogs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid bar chad med pa'i rang bzhin can yin na/ 'o na ci'i phyir 'chad par chad/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam
261b1(mdo sde): dpal tshe dang ldan pa sha ra'i bu 'di nyan thos rnams kyi nang na shes rab che ba'i mchog tu bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs kyis 'di la dris shig/ 'di nyid khyod
261b2(mdo sde): la 'chad par 'gyur ro// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis shod kho bo ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas chos bstan pa la nyan par 'dod
261b3(mdo sde): kyis/ 'chad par ni mi 'dod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni sngon sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag mang po'i spyan sngar chos 'chad cing nyan thos
261b4(mdo sde): chen po dag kyang tsang mi smras par gzhog pa kho bos mthong ngo // tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyis zhing brgya stong phrag mang po 'das
261b5(mdo sde): ba na 'jig rten gyis khams dang ba can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog gis 'od
261b6(mdo sde): ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston to// de nas nyan thos chen po shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba nyan thos rnams kyi na shes rab chen po'i
261b7(mdo sde): mchog tu bcom ldan 'das des gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od kyis me tog de/
261b8(mdo sde): nam nang du yang dag par 'jog par gyur pa de'i tshe/ nyan thos chen po shes rab sgron ma de tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na chad du mngon par song ste/ thams cad dang ldan
263a1(mdo sde): pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyis khams 'dun pa byas pa nas chos ston to// kho bo 'jam dpal gzhon
263a2(mdo sde): nur gyur pa yang 'jig rten gyis khams der phyin te/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag mang po dang / lha'i bu brgya phrag stong yang chos nyan par 'dod
263a3(mdo sde): pa'i phyir/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i phyir 'brang bar gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i 'od gsal gyis lha'i rigs su 'dug ste/ mgul
263a4(mdo sde): bstsal pa'i sgra gang gis stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams sgras go bar gyur pa dang / bdud gyi gnas thams cad spa gong bar 'gyur de lta bu'i
263a5(mdo sde): mgul bstsal pa'i sgra byung ngo // de nas nyan thos chen po des mgul bstsal pa'i sgra de thos pa dang / mgul bstsal pa'i sgra de shugs ma bzod pas// rnam pa
263a6(mdo sde): mthor ba'i rlung gis bus pa'i bya bzhin du sa la ltung ste/ de sngangs te spu zing byed par gyur nas/ ngo mtshar du bzung ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
263a7(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od kyi me tog de ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
263a8(mdo sde): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mgul bskul pa'i sgra dag thos pas/ bdag mgul bstsal pa'i sgra'i shugs
263b1(mdo sde): de ma bzod pas/ rnam par mthor rlung gis bus pa'i bya bzhin du dogs sa la ltung bar gyur pa'i mgul bstsal ba'i sgra zab mo 'di sus bgyis/ bcom ldan
263b2(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba/ phyir mi ldog pa skye ba cig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de nga la lta ba dang /
263b3(mdo sde): phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bskur ba dang / yongs su zhu ba dang / yongs su legs par zhu bar bya ba'i phyir/ chags pa med pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis rnam par rtse
263b4(mdo sde): zhing 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de 'od bsal gyis lha'i rigs su 'dug nas/ mgul brtsal ba'i sgra gang gis/
263b5(mdo sde): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyis khams thams cad sgras go bar 'gyur dang / bdud kyi gnas thams cad spa dkong bar 'gyur ba de lta'i mgul
263b6(mdo sde): bstsal pa'i sgra byung ngo // des gsol pa bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa de lta bu dag mthong na legs par gyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de bdag
263b7(mdo sde): cag gis kyang blta bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis me tog gis/
263b8(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'ong bar bya'i phyir mtshan ma mdzad do// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lhan cig tu
264a1(mdo sde): bar snang las babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
264a2(mdo sde): rgyas 'od kyis me tog de ga la ba der song ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
264a3(mdo sde): bskor nas/ 'khor dang bcas te/ ji ltar rang gi smon lam dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis mthus sprul pa'i bstan cig 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das
264a4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od kyis tog gis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces
264a5(mdo sde): bka' stsal te/ 'jam dpal khyod don gyis dbang ci zhig mthong na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dang can 'dir 'ongs/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol
264a6(mdo sde): pa bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bskur ba dang / yongasu zhu ba dang / yongs su legs par zhu ba'i slad du'o// /
264a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba shin tu rnam par dag par 'gyur/ ji ltar na
264a8(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag byas par 'gyur/ ji ltar na bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur/ ji ltar na yongs su zhus par 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol
264b1(mdo sde): pa/ bcom ldan 'das nam chos mthong ba shin tu rnam par dag pa de lta bu de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba shin tu rnam par dag pa lags so// bcom
264b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das nam lus dang sems kyis 'dud par mi bgyid/ rab tu 'dud par mi bgyid cing / bgyid ma mchis par gnas pa/ mi g.yo ba thob pa/
264b3(mdo sde): sems dben pa'i ngang tshul spyod pa dran dang ldan zhing / shes bzhin du bgyid pa de lta bu ni de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag bgyis par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan
264b4(mdo sde): 'das nam bdag tu sgro 'dogs par mi bgyid/ gzhan du sgro 'dog sa par mi bgyid/ mnyam pa nyid la mnyam par mi bgyid/ mi mnyam pa nyid la mi
264b5(mdo sde): mnyam par mi bgyid cing / bgyid pa ma mchis/ rnam par bgyid pa ma mchis/ log par mi mthong ba/ gang la yang ring por mi 'gyur ba/ nye bar mi
264b6(mdo sde): 'gyur de lta bu ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur bgyis par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das nam tshul bzhin ma lags kyis/ nam tshul bzhin
264b7(mdo sde): du zhu ba/ tshul bzhin ma lags pa ci'ang mi mthong ba/ bdag gis tshul bzhin gyis chos thams cad kyi tshul bzhin gyis rjes su 'chi ba/ g.yeng ba'i sems
264b8(mdo sde): kyi ma lags/ mnyam par bzhag pas zhu bas/ gang zhu ba dang / gang gis slad du zhu ba dang / gang la zhu ba de dus gsum du yongs su tshol zhing / 'khor gsum yongasu
265a1(mdo sde): dag pas zhu ba de lta bu ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su zhus par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das nam zhu ba ma mchis
265a2(mdo sde): pa la rnags par mi bgyid pa/ ji skad gsungs pa'i rjes 'thun par bgyid pa de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par bgyid pa/ 'khor thams cad la ma mgu
265a3(mdo sde): bgyid pa/ yongs su zhu ba la mi chags so// yongs su zhu ba des kyang sems can tshad ma mchis pa rnams byang chub tu go cha skyon zhing / go cha de yang nam byang chub
265a4(mdo sde): kyi snying po la thugs gis bar du mi 'dor ba de lta bu ni de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su legs par bgyis par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
265a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od kyis tog gis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal
265a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la de ltar blta bar bya'o// de ltar phyag bya'o// de ltar bstan bkur bya'o// de ltar yongs su zhu bar bya'o// de ltar yongs su legs par
265a7(mdo sde): zhu bar bya'o// zhes smras pa de ni/ khyod kyis legs par bshad pa leg so legs so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ nyan thos chen po shes rab sgron
265a8(mdo sde): ma la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa la ji ltar mthong / ji ltar phyag 'tshal/ ji ltar bstan bkur byed/ ji ltar yongs su zhu/
265b1(mdo sde): ltar yongs su legs par zhu/ des smras pa/ 'jam dpal bstan pa 'di lta bu ni/ kho bo cag lta bu nyan thos gzhan gyi sgra'i rjes su mos pa rnams kyis
265b2(mdo sde): yul ma yin no// smras pa 'o na gang mngon par rtogs pas/ tshe dang ldan pa shes rab sgron ma'i sems rnam par grol lo// 'jam dpal dben pa mngon par rtogs pas
265b3(mdo sde): sems rnam par grol lo// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa bden pa zhes bya ba ci la bstan par 'gyur/ des smras pa/ 'jam dpal gnyen med pas rab tu phye ba ni
265b4(mdo sde): bden pa'o// 'o na ji ltar bden par mngon par rtogs pas/ tshe dang ldan pa'i sems rnams par grol smras pa/ 'jam dpal kun rdzob nye bar bzung ste de
265b5(mdo sde): skad ces ston/ don dam pa ni yin no// smras pa/ ci kun rdzob don dam pa 'am/ smras pa gal te mi 'du 'am/ gal te mi 'du na don dam pa med par
265b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// smras pa 'o na ji ltar kun rdzob nye bar bzungs ste/ ston gyi/ don dam par ma yin/ gal te kun rdzob don dam du 'dun 'di lta ste/ don dam
265b7(mdo sde): pa'i bden pa bden gcig pur mi 'gyur ram/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal bshad pa 'di thos nas las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams sgrags par
265b8(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// spras pa btsun pa nyid kyang skrag na las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams lta ci smos/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal skrag pa ma/ smras pa/
266a1(mdo sde): bya/ tshe dang ldan pa ci skrag pa med pa dang / skye ba med pas nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam
266a2(mdo sde): par grol lam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal nyan thos rnams ni skrag pa med pa dang / skyo ba med par rnam par mi grol lo// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa de bas na sngon
266a3(mdo sde): skrag pa de nyid las bsams nas/ btsun pa nyid kyang skrag na las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams lta ci smos zhes de skad smras so// smras pa byang chub
266a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' ji ltar rnam par grol lo// smras pa btsun pa byang chub sems dpa' ni skrag pa med pa dang / skyo ba med pas rnam par grol lo// smras pa/ 'jam
266a5(mdo sde): dpal ci las bsams te de skad ces smras pa/ smras pa bdud kyis sde bye ba phrag brgyas mi skrag cing / sems can rnams la chos bshad pas/ mi skyo la/
266a6(mdo sde): bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad med pa bsags pas/ mi skrag cing ye shes kyi tshogs tshad med pa bsags pas mi skyo'o// de nas 'khor der lha'i bu gang dag
266a7(mdo sde): 'dus par gyur pa de dag gis me tog sna tshogs kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la gtor to// gang na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snang ba der ni/
266a8(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du mthong ba yin no// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang du gnas pa'i sa phyogs de'ang mchod rten du 'gyur ro// gang gis 'jam
266b1(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i chos bstan pa kun tu shes sam/ kun tu shes par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag gis kyang / bsod nams thams cad yongs su
266b2(mdo sde): bzung ba yin no// zhes de skad kyi tshigs smras so// de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas nyan thos chen po shes rab sgron ma la 'di skad ces smras
266b3(mdo sde): so// tshe dang ldan pa nyan thos rnams kyi nang na shes rab che ba'i mchog tu bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs na ci shes rab de 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid dam/
266b4(mdo sde): 'on te 'dus ma byas kyis mtshan nyid/ gal te 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid yin na ni/ skye shing 'jig dang ldan par 'gyur ro// ci ste 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan
266b5(mdo sde): nyid yin na ni// mtshan nyid gsum las ldog par 'gyur ro// smras pa 'jam dpal 'phags pa rnams ni 'dus byas kyi rab tu phye bar ston to// smras pa che dang
266b6(mdo sde): ldan pa 'dus byas pa gdags par nus sam/ smras pa 'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/ 'dus ma byas la gdags pa gang yang med do// smras pa 'on
266b7(mdo sde): ji 'phags pa rnams 'dus byas kyi rab tu phye bar ston/ de skad ces smras pa dang / nyan thos chen po shes rab sgron ma de cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas de
266b8(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od kyi tog des/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
267a1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal chos gang yang thos pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par
267a2(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub la phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi sgo 'ga' zhig las bsgoms te/ 'khor 'dir khyod kyi ston cig/ 'jam dpal gyis
267a3(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi sgo rnams bstan thams cad kyang dbyen pa'i sgo ste/ dben pa'i sgo dag dben pa nyid du ston to// yang
267a4(mdo sde): de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos kyis blo gros zhes bya ba 'khor der 'dus par gyur te/ 'dus pa des 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras
267a5(mdo sde): so ta 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug bstan pa de dag ci dben pa'i sgo ste/ dben pa'i sgo nyid du bstan pa yin
267a6(mdo sde): nam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gang nas byung / smras pa 'jam dpal 'dod chags dang /
267a7(mdo sde): zhe sdang dang / gti mug ni rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa las byung ngo // smras pa/ rigs kyi bu rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa de yang gang nas byung / smras pa/
267a8(mdo sde): 'jam dpal rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa ni phyin ci logs las byung ngo // smras pa rigs kyi bu phyin ci log kyang gang nas byung / smras pa/ 'jam dpal phyin ci
267b1(mdo sde): log ni rang 'dzin pa dang / ngar yir 'dzin pa las byung ngo // smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa gang byung / smras pa/ 'jam dpal
267b2(mdo sde): ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa ni 'jigs tshogs la lta ba las byung ngo // smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'jig tshogs la lta bA nas byung / smras pa/
267b3(mdo sde): 'jig tshogs la lta ba ni bdag las byung ngo // smras pa/ rigs kyi bu bdag kyang gang nas byung / smras pa/ 'jam dpal bdag ni gang nas kyang ma byung
267b4(mdo sde): te/ byung ba med pa ni bdag byung ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar bdag ni phyogs bcur yongs su btsal kyang mi dmigs so// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu
267b5(mdo sde): chos gang dag phyogs bcur yongs su btsal kyang mi dmigs pa de'i sgo ci zhig yod// smras pa/ 'jam dpal dben pa nyid de'i sgra'o// rigs kyi bu
267b6(mdo sde): dben pa'i sgo ci yin/ smras pa 'jam dpal sgo med pa nyid dben pa'i sgo ste/ rigs kyi bu kho bos de las bsams te chos thams cad kyi sgo rnams kyi
267b7(mdo sde): bstan pa thams cad kyang dben pa'i sgo ste/ de dag dben pa'i sgo nyid du ston to zhes des smras so// bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'
267b8(mdo sde): brgyad brgyas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ der brgya chen chos ston pa byas nas rten las ladra
268a1(mdo sde): / te/ song ngo // tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang / nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas gang gis kyang 'jam
268a2(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de'i spobs pa'i rgyun gcod nus pa med na skabs ma phye bar bdag cig pus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang lhan cig tu smras par ga
268a3(mdo sde): la nus/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri bu/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ sangs
268a4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing du spyod pa spyod pa na rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang / cho 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa ji snyed cig mthong / sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kho bos mngon
268a5(mdo sde): par shes te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang lhan cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du spyad pa spyod na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang tshig pa de dag ni 'jam dpal gzhon
268a6(mdo sde): nur gyur pa song ba dang / chus yongs su gang zhing pad+ma mang pos g.yog par gnas par gyur to// gang chus yongs su gang zhing pad+ma mang pos yog par gnas par
268a7(mdo sde): gyur to// gang dag chus yongs su gang ba de dag ni/ mes yongs su gang bar gnas par gyur te/ mi de yang reg na 'di lta ste/ dper na/ tsan dan sbrul gyis
268a8(mdo sde): snying po 'am/ ka tsa len 'di'i gos lta bur gyur to// gang dag stong pa na mkha'i gyur pa de dag ni/ tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang gis brgyan cing / bsam gtan
268b1(mdo sde): la snyoms par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpas yongs su gang bar gnas par gyur to// gang dag 'chags pa de dag ni 'jig par snang ngo // gang dag
268b2(mdo sde): ngan song gis yongs su gang ba de dag ni ngan song thams cad dang bral bar snang ste/ sems can de dag kyang byang chub kyis yan lag gis rnam pas bskyed pa'i
268b3(mdo sde): byams pa thob par gyur to// byang chub kyis yan lag gis rnam pas bskyed pa'i byams pa gang zhe na/ gang snyoms par zhugs na bdag bla na med pa yang
268b4(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ sems can gang dag nyon mongs pa 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis
268b5(mdo sde): bzir ba de dag gis 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug shin tu spong bar bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to snyam sems pa ste/ gang de ltar byams pa'i
268b6(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin la snyom par 'jug pa de ni/ byang chub kyis yan lag gis rnam pas bskyed pa'i byams pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de'i tshe de'i
268b7(mdo sde): dus na/ kho bo'i sems la sems kyi rnam par rtog pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul gang yin pa dang / bdag gis gang yin pa de gnyis ni
268b8(mdo sde): mnyam mo snyam du gyur pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sems kyis kho bo'i sems kyi rnam par rtogs pa de shes nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen
269a1(mdo sde): / po'i 'jig rten gyis khas me 'bar ba na/ 'jig rten gyi bar du 'dug ste/ kho bo 'di skad ces zer ro// ci che
269a2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu rdzu 'phrul gyis thus 'jig rten gyi khams 'di las rgal bar bya 'am/ 'on te kho bo'i rdzu 'phrul gyis mthus rgal bar bya kho bos de la 'di
269a3(mdo sde): skad ces smras so// kho bos rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu'i 'gyogs pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di las rgal bar bya'o// zhes tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kho bo rdzu
269a4(mdo sde): 'phrul gyi mthu'i 'gyogs pa'i cho 'phrul thams cad bstan te/ mdom gang tsam 'khor yug du ma de zhi bar byas nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang lhan
269a5(mdo sde): cig tu nyin zhag bdun gyis khams de rgal to// de nas dus gzhan zhig na de bas kyang shin du rgya che zhing / yangs pa'i 'dzin rten gyi khams me 'bar na/
269a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar du 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dug ste/ kho bos la 'di skad ces zer ro// btsun pa sha ri'i bu su'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus 'jig
269a7(mdo sde): rten gyi khams 'di khos rgal bar bya/ kho bos de la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis mthus 'jig rten gyis khams 'di rgal ba
269a8(mdo sde): bya'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ mngon par 'du byed pa'i mngon sum gyis rdzu 'phrul sems bskyed pa gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams de pad+ma'i
269b1(mdo sde): dra bas g.yogs pa te/ rgal bar gyur/ rgal nas kho bo la 'di skad ces zer ro// btsun pa sha ra'i bu bdag cag gnyis ga la su'i mthu dang ldan pa'i rdzu
269b2(mdo sde): 'phrul gyis shugs mgyogs/ kho bos de la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/ bya lang gu'i li dang / bya'i rgyal po na mkha'
269b3(mdo sde): lding gnyis gang gis mthu gang gis mthu shin tu 'gyogs/ smras pa btsun pa sha ri'i bu/ bya'i rgyal po na mkha'i lding gis mthu'i mgyogs pa ni tshad med pa ste/
269b4(mdo sde): dpe slad du sla ba ma yin no// de la kho bos 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal bya lang gu la'i mgyogs pa lta bu ni kho bo'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mgyogs pa la lta bar
269b5(mdo sde): bya'o// ji ltar bya'i rgyal po na mkha' lding gis mthu'i mgyogs pa de bas/ brgya stong gis shin du lhag par khyod kyis rdzu 'phrul mgyogs par blta'o// des smras pa/
269b6(mdo sde): btsun pa sha ri'i bu khyod kyis sems kyis rnam par rtog pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul gang yin pa dang / bdag gis gang yin pa de gnyis ni mnyam du ma
269b7(mdo sde): gyur tam/ kho bos de la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal ji skad sbas pa bzhin te/ kho bo de sman du gyur to// de smras pa de'i ci'i phyir de snyam du gyur/ kho bo
269b8(mdo sde): de la 'di skad ces smras so// nyan thos rnams ni bag chags kyis 'tshams sbyor ba ma bcad pa'i phyir mi mnyam du zin kyang / mnyam pa mnyam du bdag nyid kyis
270a1(mdo sde): shes so// des smras pa/ btsun pa sha ri'i bu leg so leg so// de skad smras pa de bzhin no// btsun pa sha ri'i bu sngon
270a2(mdo sde): 'byung ba 'das pa'i dus na brgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram na drang srong chos 'dod ces bya ba dang / kun byin zhes bya ba gnyis shig 'khod de/ de la chos 'dod ni lnga mngon
270a3(mdo sde): par shes shing / mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse bar gyur to// kun byin ni rig pa sngags kyis mthus steng gi bar snang la 'gro bar gyur to// de nas de gnyis
270a4(mdo sde): dus su spyod pa'i phyir/ brgya mtsho'i tshu rol du dong ste/ dong nas slar log cing rang rang gis gnas su 'khod do// de nas drang srong kun byin de kho bo'i rdzu 'phrul
270a5(mdo sde): gang yin pa dang / chos 'dod kyis gang yin pa de gnyis ni mnyam mo snyam du gyur to// de nas dus gzhan zhig na brgya mtsho'i tshu rol nas pha rol tu song ste/ srin mo'i
270a6(mdo sde): gling du phyin pa dang / der srin mo de dag gis yid du 'ong ba'i rol mo'i sgra byas par gyur pa yang drang srong kun byin gyis thos srin mo de dag kyang mthong nas/ na mkha'i
270a7(mdo sde): dkyil nas sa'i steng du ltung ngo // de'i rig pa dang sngags kyang ma rung bar gyur to// de nas drang srong chos 'dod snying rje'i sems skyes nas lag pa g.yas pas gzungs
270a8(mdo sde): ste/ slar rang gi gnas su khrid nas gzhag go/ btsun pa sha ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ sa drang srong chos 'dod ces bya ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod the tshom 'am/
270b1(mdo sde): yid gnyis su gyur na de ltar mi lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kho bo nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong chos 'dod ces bya bar gyur to// btsun pa sha ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i
270b2(mdo sde): dus na/ drang srong kun byin zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam du the tshol 'am/ yid gnyis su gyur ni de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyod nyid de'i tshe de'i
270b3(mdo sde): dus na kun byin zhes bya bar gyur to// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de'i tshe yang mi mnyam par bdag mnyam pa nyid du bzhag go/ de ltar de phyogs gcig pa'i ye shes dang
270b4(mdo sde): ldan pa'i phyir da ltar yang mi mnyam pa gzhan du bdag dang mnyam par bzhag go/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// /
270b5(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kho bos mngon par shes te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / lhan cig tu lho phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sprad pa spyod pa'i tshe/
270b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams brgyan thams cad kyi klub pa zhes bya ba na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
270b7(mdo sde): ba rin po che srog shing zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bcom ldan 'das de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba'i phyir te/ de nas yang 'jam
270b8(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa kho bo la 'di skad ces zer ro// btsun pa sha ri'i bu khyod kyis bdag cag gis rgal ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag mthong ngam/ kho bos/
271a1(mdo sde): de la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal mthong ngo // des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyis zhing de dag
271a2(mdo sde): ci 'dra bar mthong / de la kho bos 'di skad ces smras so// kha cig ni mes yongs su gang ba'o// kha cig ni chus yongs su gang ba'o// kha cig ni namakhar gyur
271a3(mdo sde): ba'o// kha cig ni 'byor ci rgyas pa'o// kha cig ni 'jig pa'o// kha cig ni chags pa'o// kha cig ni ngan song gis gang ba'o// kha cig ni ngan song dang bral ba'o// /
271a4(mdo sde): smras pa che dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag ji ltar blta bar bya/ de la kho bos 'di skad ces smras so// gang dag mes yongs su gang ba de dag ni mes
271a5(mdo sde): yongs su gang ba blta bar bya'o// gang dag chus yongs su gang ba de dag ni/ chus yongs su gang ba nyid du blta bar bya'o// gang dag na mkhar gyur pa de dag ni na mkhar
271a6(mdo sde): gyur pa nyid du blta bar bya'o// gang dag 'byor cing rgyas pa de dag ni 'byor cing rgyas pa nyid du blta bar bya'o// gang dag 'jig pa de dag ni 'jig pa nyid du blta bar bya'o//
271a7(mdo sde): gang dag chags pa de dag ni chags pa nyid du blta'o// gang dag ngan song gis yongs su gang ba de dag ni/ ngan song gis yongs su gang ba nyid du blta bar bya'o// gang dag
271a8(mdo sde): ngan song dang bral ba de dag ni ngan song dang bral ba nyid du blta bar bya'o// des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti bu ye shes kyi stong pa nyid na mkhar gyur pa de dag ni tshangs
271b1(mdo sde): pa'i gzhal med khang gis brgyan cing / bsam gtan la snyoms pa'i byang chub sems dpas yongs su gang bar gnas par gyur to// gang dag chags pa de dag ni 'jig
271b2(mdo sde): par snang ngo // gang dag ngan song gis yongs su gang ba de dag ni ngan song thams cad dang bral bar snang ste/ sems can de dag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag gis rnam
271b3(mdo sde): par bskyed pa'i byams pa thobs par gyur to// byang chub kyi yan lag gi rnam pas bskyed pa'i byams pa gang zhe na/ gang snyoms par zhugs na bdag bla na med
271b4(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ sems can gang dag nyon mongs pa 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis
271b5(mdo sde): gzir ba de dag gis 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug shin tu spangs bya'i phyir bstan to// snyam sems pa ste/ gang de ltar byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la
271b6(mdo sde): snyoms par 'jug pa de ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag gis rnam par bskyed pa'i byams pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de'i tshe de'i dus na/ kho bo'i sems la
271b7(mdo sde): sems kyi rnam par rtog pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa rdzu 'phrul gang yin pa dang / bdag gis gang yin pa de gnyis ni/ mnyam mo mnyam du gyur pa dang /
271b8(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sems kyis kho bo'i sems kyi rnam par rtog pa de shes nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir me 'bar
272a1(mdo sde): ba na 'jig rten gyi khams du 'jug ste/ kho bo la 'di skad ces zer ro// ci che dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyis
272a2(mdo sde): mthus/ 'jig rten gyis khams 'di las rgal bar bya 'am/ 'on te kho bo'i rdzu 'phrul gyis mthus brgal bar bya/ kho bos de la 'di smras so// kho bo'i
272a3(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul gyis mthu'i 'gyogs pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di las brgal bar bya'o// zhes tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kho bos rdzu 'phrul gyis mthu'i 'gyog
272a4(mdo sde): po'i cho 'phrul thams cad bstan ste/ mdom gang tsam 'khor yug tu me de zhi bar byas nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / lhan cig tu nyin zhag bdun
272a5(mdo sde): gyis 'jig rten gyis khams de rgal to// de nas dus gzhan zhig na de bas kyang shin du brgya che zhing yang pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su me 'bar ba/ 'jig
272a6(mdo sde): rten gyi khams kyi bar du 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dus ste/ kho bo la 'di skad ces zer ro// btsun pa sha ri'i bu su'i mthu rdzu 'phrul gyis mthus
272a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di las brgal bar bya/ kho bos 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus 'jig rten gyi khams
272a8(mdo sde): 'di brgal bar bya'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ mngon par 'du byed pa'i sngon sum gyi rdzu 'phrul gyis sems bskyed pa gcig gis 'jig
272b1(mdo sde): rten gyis khams pad+ma'i dra bas g.yogs te rgal bar gyur to// rgal nas kho bo la 'di skad ces zer ro// btsun pa sha ri'i bu bdag cag gnyis ga las
272b2(mdo sde): su'i mthu dang / ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis shugs 'gyogs/ kho bos de la 'di skad ces smraso// 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/ bya lang gu'i li
272b3(mdo sde): dang bya'i rgyal po na mkha' lding gnyis gang gis mthu shin tu 'gyogs smras pa/ btsun pa sha ri'i bu bya'i rgyal po na mkha' lding gis mthu'i mgyogs pa ni tshad
272b4(mdo sde): med pa ste/ dpe blangs du bla ba ma yin no// de la kho bos 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal bya lang 'gu la'i mgyogs pa lta bu ni kho bo'i rdzu 'phrul gyis
272b5(mdo sde): 'gyogs pa la lta bar bya'o// ji ltar bya'i rgyal po na mkha' lding gis mthu'i 'gyogs pa/ de bas brgya stong gi sa shin tu lhag par khyod kyis rdzu 'phrul mgyogs
272b6(mdo sde): par blta'o// des smras pa/ btsun pa sha ri'i bu khyod kyis sems kyis rnam par rtog pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul gang yin pa dang bdag gis
272b7(mdo sde): gang yin pa de gnyis ni mnyam mo mnyam du gyur tam/ kho bos de la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal la ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ kho bos de snyam du
272b8(mdo sde): gyur to// des smras pa bzhin de ci'i phyir de snyam du gyur na/ kho bos de la 'di skad ces smras so// nyan thos rnams ni bdag 'chags mtshams sbyor ba ma bcad
273a1(mdo sde): pa'i phyir/ mi mnyam du zin kyang mnyam pa mnyam du bdag nyid kyis shes so// yul ji lta ba bshad pa'ang de bzhin to// /
273a2(mdo sde): de la kho bos 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag ji ltar mthong / des smras pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing
273a3(mdo sde): thams cad ni na mkha'i zhing du mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste mes yongs su gang ba 'am chus yongs su gang ba 'am/ rab 'byor cing rgyas pa 'am/
273a4(mdo sde): 'jig pa 'am/ 'chags pa 'am/ ngan song gi yongs su gang ba 'am ngan song dang yongs su bral ba de dag ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'o// rkyen de dag
273a5(mdo sde): ni glo bur du byung ba ste/ skye zhing 'jig pa dang ldan pa'o// na mkha'i rkyen gyis 'byung ba ma yin te/ rang bzhin du gnas pa nyid do// de bzhin du
273a6(mdo sde): blo bur nye bar nyon mongs pas/ sems nyon mongs par gyur pa zhes bya ste/ sems kyis rang bzhin ni nam yang nyon mongs par 'gyur ba med do// tshe dang ldan
273a7(mdo sde): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ 'das pa'i dus na gang gi'i rlung gis bye ma snyed kyi bskal pas sreg pa byung yang / na mkha' la sngon nam yang tshig pa med
273a8(mdo sde): dota/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du sems can re ras kyang / gang gi'i rlung gis bye ma snyed kyi mi dge ba'i las mngon du byas kyang / sems kyis rang
273b1(mdo sde): bzhin du nam mongs par 'gyur ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang la la rang bzhin gyi yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi dbying
273b2(mdo sde): de lta bu la 'jug pa dag ni kun nas ldang ba 'am/ sgrib pa 'am/ sngon du byed pas/ kun nas ldang bar 'gyur ba cung zad kyang med de/ 'di ni kun nas ldang
273b3(mdo sde): ba med pa'i sgo'o// chos kyi sgo de la brtan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad rang bzhin yongs su dag par zhugs nas
273b4(mdo sde): nyes pa las 'byung ba la mkhas par shes shing / de'i sems rnams kyang sgrub pa'i chos rnams kyi sgrib par mi 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'jam
273b5(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phral pa dang / chos bstan pa rnam par 'phrul pa las gang kho bos phyogs zhig mngon sum du gyur de lta ba de dag
273b6(mdo sde): yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu kho bos kyang 'jam dpal gzhon
273b7(mdo sde): nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis cho 'phrul kha cig mngon sum du gyur to// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu kho bos mngon par shes te/ dus cig na bcom ldan 'das
273b8(mdo sde): mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong brgyad brgya'i dge slong gis dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa
274a1(mdo sde): / khri nyis stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe na mnyan yod du dus ma yin pa'i sprin chen po zhig byung ste/ de
274a2(mdo sde): la nyin zhag bdun du rgyun ma chad par dus ma yin par char chen po 'bab bo// de nas dge slong gang dag rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu che ba/ bsam gtan dang /
274a3(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thob pa de dag ni bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pas dus 'das par byas
274a4(mdo sde): kyi rta gang dag ma tho ba de dag ni nyin zhag bdun du zas chad par gyur to// de nas dge slong de dag nyam chung ba dang ldan te/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'dong yang ma
274a5(mdo sde): nus/ de la kho bos 'di snyam du gyur to// e ma ho dge slong 'di dag ni brdud par gyur na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis drung du song ste/ chu la de dag bcom
274a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das la gsol lo snyam gyur nas// kho bos bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag
274a7(mdo sde): 'chal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das e ma ho// dge slong 'di dag nyin zhag bdun du 'tshal ma chad de/ bkres
274a8(mdo sde): pas nyams chung ba dang ldan pas brdud de/ khri dang khri'i las ldang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das lta ba'i slad du mchi ba yi rdo yang mi thog go/ de nas bcom ldan
274b1(mdo sde): 'das kyi kho bo la 'dis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyod song ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i tshul de dag smros shig dang / de dag dge
274b2(mdo sde): slong gis dge 'dun rtas par byed par 'gyur ro// kho bos bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar mnyan nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gnas khang ga la ba der song
274b3(mdo sde): ste phyin pa Ta de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur par rang gis gnas khang brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la chos ston pa mthong ngo // 'jam
274b4(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa des kho bo gnas khang gis nang du 'ongs pa mthong ste/ mthong nas 'di skad ces zer ro// btsun pa kun dga' bo khyod ci'i phyir rlung dang char
274b5(mdo sde): gyi nang na 'dir 'ongs/ kho bos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa tshul de dag smras so// de kho bo la kun dga' bo song ste/ stan thing la gdugs tshong bab na mgon 'di
274b6(mdo sde): rdung shig/ ces de skad zer na// kho bos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gnas khang nas byung ste/ dge 'dun gyis kun dga' ra bar song nas bstan gting ba
274b7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa tsI nas khang nas byung ngam zhes/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gnas khang du lta zhing phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas 'jam dpal
274b8(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pas lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sprul pa gzhan zhig sprul te/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa
275a1(mdo sde): dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag la chos ston to// de gnas khang nas byung ste/ mnyan yod na grong khyer chen
275a2(mdo sde): por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs na bdag gi mthong ngo // de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du gyur te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dis/ seng
275a3(mdo sde): ge'i sgra sgrags nas/ mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs nas/ bdag gis 'di mig gis mi rtsol bar bya'o// snyam du bsams
275a4(mdo sde): nas/ des de nyid kyi mnyan yod kyis grong khyer chen po'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / grong 'dab dang / yul mi gang gis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon
275a5(mdo sde): nur gyur pa mi mthong ba dang / gang yang sngar mi 'ong ba dang / sa yang bsod snyoms mi dbul ba de lta de ltar byin gyis rlabs so// de nas 'jam dpal
275a6(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa gang dang gang du song ba de dag thams cad na sgo dag kyang bcad par snang ste/ gang yang mi slu bar gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon
275a7(mdo sde): nur gyur pas bsams nas e ma'o// bram ze dang / khyim bdag 'di dag ni ci nas bdag mi mthong ba dang / gtam mi bya bar bdud kyis byin gyis
275a8(mdo sde): brlabs so bsams nas/ des de'i tshe/ nga bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs gang dag gis/ bdag gis spu'i
275b1(mdo sde): khung gcig lus la skyes pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de yang gang gi'i rlung gi bye ma snyed kyis 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdud sdig can rnams la/ med pa'i
275b2(mdo sde): bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des bdud kyis byin gyis rlabs pa 'di dag med par gyur cig/ bdud sdig can nyid kyang khyim bdag gis tshul du srang dang //
275b3(mdo sde): sum mdo dang / bzhi mdo dag na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bsod snyoms phul cig/ phul cig/ 'di la phul nas 'bras bu che bar 'gyur ro// gang gis
275b4(mdo sde): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gartogs pa'i sems can thams cad la lo 'bum du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gro byas/ gus
275b5(mdo sde): par byas/ pu dud du byas pa bsags kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur la bsod snyoms sen mo'i rtse mo gang tsam phul na/ de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ches
275b6(mdo sde): mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro// sgrogs par gyur cig ces bden pa'i byin gyis brlab so// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byin brlabs de byas ma thag tu/ de/
275b7(mdo sde): nas de nyid kyi tshe sgo thams cad kyang byed par gyur to// skye bo mang po thams cad smra zhing / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bde bar 'ongs so zhes kyang brjod do//
275b8(mdo sde): bdud sdig can nyid kyang khyim bdag gis tshul du srang dang / sum mdo dang / bzhi mdo dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bsod snyoms phul cig/ phul cig
276a1(mdo sde): 'di la phul cig/ 'bras bu che bar 'gyur ro// gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su
276a2(mdo sde): gtogs pa'i sems can la lo 'bum du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyi rim gror byas/ gus par byas/ phu dud du byas pa bas/ gang gis 'jam
276a3(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bsod snyoms sen mo gang tsam phul na de'i bsod nams kyi phung po// ches mang du skyed par 'gyur ro// de nas 'jam dpal
276a4(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa ci nas kyang lhung bzed gsol ba'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba phal cher bcug pa de dag thams cad ji ltar snod so sor bcug pa
276a5(mdo sde): bzhin du me 'dres par 'dag pa dang / gang dge slong brgyad brgya po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong po de dag la kha zas ji tsam gyi mchog pa
276a6(mdo sde): lhung bzed des blangs par gyur pa de lta de ltar rang gi lhung bzed de byin gyis brlabs so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen
276a7(mdo sde): bor bsod snyoms kyi phyir spyad nas/ mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po'i phyi rol du phyung ste/ lam las byon nas/ lhung bzed de sa'i steng du bzhag ste/ bdad sdig
276a8(mdo sde): can la 'di skad ces sbas so// sdig can lhung bzed 'di khyer la mdun du song shig/ de nas bdud sdig can gyis lhung bzed de 'degs par byas na 'degs ma nus
276b1(mdo sde): nas/ des 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal lhung bzed 'di sa'i steng nas 'degs par ma nus so// smras pa sdig
276b2(mdo sde): can khyod kyang rdzu 'phral che zhing mthu chen po dang ldan pa yin na/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi lhung bzed 'di sa'i steng nas 'degs par gyi shig/ de nas bdud sdig can
276b3(mdo sde): gyis rdzu 'phrul gyis stobs kyis cho 'phrul thams cad bstan kyang / lhung bzed des de las tha na skra'i rtse mo'i cha tsam yang 'degs par ma nus nas/ de ngo mtshar
276b4(mdo sde): du gyur te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal kho bo ni 'dod na ri ga shol mda' 'dzin kyang lag 'thil du blangs te na mkha'
276b5(mdo sde): la 'dor na/ kho bos lhung bzed chung ngu 'di lta bu 'di sa'i steng nas 'degs par ma nus na/ de ci'i phyir de ltar gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sems
276b6(mdo sde): can chen po rnams dang / gang zag chen po rnams kyis stobs drangs pas lhung bzed 'dir bcug ste/ de'i phyir khyod kyis 'degs par ma nus so// de nas 'jam
276b7(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyid kyi lhung bzed de sa las blangs nas sdig can la byin te/ 'di skad ces smras so// sdig can lhung bzed 'di khyer la mdun du song shig/
276b8(mdo sde): de nas bdud sdig can de nga slob ma bzhin tu lhung bzed ter te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i mdun du song ngo // de nas lha'i bu dbang sgyur lha'i bu khri nyis stong gis yod
277a1(mdo sde): su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ga la ba der dong nas lhags pa dang / 'jam dpal
277a2(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so// sdig can bran bzhin du 'jam dpal gzhon nur
277a3(mdo sde): gyur pa'i lhung bzed khyer te 'dun du 'gro ba ci zhig/ bdud kyis smras pa/ lha'i bu mthu dang ldan pa rnams dang 'dren pa ci yang med do// lha'i bus smras pa/
277a4(mdo sde): sdig can khyod kyang rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu chen po dang ldan pa'i/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin brlabs kyis bdud sdig can gyis lha'i bu dbang
277a5(mdo sde): sbyar la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu 'di lta ste/ bdud kyi stobs ni gti mug gis stobs so// byang chub sems dpa'i stobs ni shes rab kyi stobaso//
277a6(mdo sde): bdud kyis stobs ni nga rgyal gyis stobs so// byang chub sems dpa'i stobs ni ye shes kyis stobs so// bdud kyis stobs ni lta bar 'byung ba'i stob so//
277a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i stobs ni stong pa nyid kyi stobs so// bdud kyis stobs ni phyin ci log gis stobs so// byang chub sems dpa'i stobs ni bden
277a8(mdo sde): pa'i stobs so// bdud kyis stobs ni nga dang ngo zhes bya ba'i stobs so// byang chub sems dpa'i stobs ni byams pa chen po snying rje chen po'i stobs so// /
277b1(mdo sde): bdud kyis stobs ni 'dod chags dang gti mug gis stobs so// byang chub sems dpa'i stobs ni thar pa'i sgo gsum gyis stobs so// bdad kyis
277b2(mdo sde): stobs ni skye ba dang 'chi ba dang 'byung ba'i stobs so// byang chub sems dpa'i stobs ni skye ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa'i chos la bzod pa rab tu stobs
277b3(mdo sde): ba'i stobs so// bdud sdig can gyis bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ lha'i bu'i 'khor de las lha'i bu lnga brgya bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
277b4(mdo sde): chub tu sems bskyes so// byang chub sems dpa' nyis ngargyas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// / bam po gsum
277b5(mdo sde): pa'o// // de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bdud sdig can dang lhan cig tu lhung bzed 'khor gyis khyams bzhag ste song
277b6(mdo sde): yang / kho bos ma mthos nas// gdugs tshod la bab par gyur kyang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gnas khang de nas byung ba 'am/ zhugs par yang
277b7(mdo sde): ma mthong nas/ de la kho bos 'di snyam du gyur te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong gi dge 'dun ma slus sam/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis
277b8(mdo sde): drung du song ste/ tshul de dag gsol lo snyam du gyur nas/ kho bo bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis
278a1(mdo sde): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gdug
278a2(mdo sde): chod la bab na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni gnas khang de nas ma byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyi kho bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun
278a3(mdo sde): dga' bo khyod kyis 'khor gyis khyams der ci yang ma mthong ngam/ bcom ldan 'das la kho bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de nas
278a4(mdo sde): lhung bzed zas kyis gang gcig gda'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi kho bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo song la 'gen bde rdungs ste/
278a5(mdo sde): dge slong gis dge 'dun sdug shig bcom ldan 'das la kho bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gis dge 'dun 'di dag
278a6(mdo sde): mang po zhig mchis na lhung bzed cig gang ba'i zas kyis ji ltar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod snying las chung
278a7(mdo sde): bar byos shig/ kun dga' bo gal te stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyis khamasu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyis lo 'bum du
278a8(mdo sde): lhung bzed gcig po de las zos kyang / lhung bzed de ni yongs su zad par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lhung bzed de ni 'jam dpal
278b1(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pas byin gyis rlabs te/ 'jam dngal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ni zad mi shes pa'i bsod nams las byung ba'o//
278b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi ji ltar kho bos mnyan nas/ sems dga' bas 'gran sde rdungs nas/ dge slongs gi dge 'dun yang gsogs so// /
278b3(mdo sde): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'gen 'de'i sgra thos nas/ lha'i bu de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang 'grogs te/
278b4(mdo sde): rang gi gnas khang nas byung ste/ khyams zlums por song nas/ lhung bzed de la bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dang / myang ba rnams ji ltar
278b5(mdo sde): snod so so na bzhag pa lta bur phan tshun ma 'dres pa phal cher byung ste/ dge slong mang po thams cad kyang rtas par byas so// byang chub sems
278b6(mdo sde): dpal mang po thams cad kyang tshim par byas kyang / zas de ni yongs su zad pa'am/ gdugs par ma gyur to// de nas bdud sdig can gyis/
278b7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bar chad bya ba'i phyir sham thabs legs par ma bgos pa/ kha cig ni bla gos legs par mgyon pa/ sha tshugs
278b8(mdo sde): ma legs pa/ lhung bzed rdol cing chags pa gos ngan pa/ sna leb leb po dang / zhar ba dang / theng po dang / zha bo dang / de la kha cig
279a1(mdo sde): ni ha cang yang ring ba/ kha cig ni ha cang thung ba/ kha cig ni ha cang gi nag pa/ kha cig ni ha cang dkar ba/ kha cig ni ha cang
279a2(mdo sde): skyem pa/ kha cig ni ha cung sbom pa/ kha cig ni skar po// kha cig ni mi'u thung ste/ de dag gzhon pa'i 'tha' nas phyag 'tshal zhing / rgan pa'i thar
279a3(mdo sde): 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tsho gas gang gis mthong ba'i sems skyo bar gyur pa'i dge slong bzhi khri sprul par gyur to// de dag la yang lhung bzed de nas bsod pa'i
279a4(mdo sde): bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba phal cher phyung ste/ byin kyang lhung bzed de zad par ma gyur to// de nas bdud sdig can gyis sprul pa'i dge slong re re
279a5(mdo sde): kyang rta 'bras chen yul ma ga ta'i bre'o bcu bcu zos kyang tshim par ma gyur par de ltar byin gyis brlabaso// de na rung byed rnams thams cad yongs su skyo bar
279a6(mdo sde): gyur kyang de dag tshim par byed par ma nus so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ gang dge slong de dag lhung bzed rnams yongs su gang la/ lag
279a7(mdo sde): pa na yang khams thogs shing khar bcug pa'i khams yang mi nus la/ de dag 'grin par bzhin du mig log ste la lhung ba de ltar byin gyis brlab so// de nas
279a8(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smra so// sdig can khyod kyis dge slong 'di dag ci'i phyir zas mi za/ bdud kyis smras
279b1(mdo sde): pa 'jam dpal gzhon nu bdag gis dge slong 'di dag ni shi la thugs par gyur na/ khyod kyis dug dang sres pa'i zas ma byin grang / 'jam dpal gyis/
279b2(mdo sde): smras pa/ sdig can med pa rnams dag sbyin par ga la 'gyur/ gang dag dug srel ba de dag ni sbyin par byed kyis/ gang dag dug mi srel ba de dag ni dug
279b3(mdo sde): sbyin par mi byed do// sdig can dug med pa rnams dug ces bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug ste/ de dag kyang legs par
279b4(mdo sde): gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba med do// dug ces bya ba ni ma rig pa dang / srid pa'i sred pa dang / nga dang nga'i zhes bya ba dang / rgyu dang / lta ba dang / ming gzug
279b5(mdo sde): dang / rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba dang / bdag tu lta ba dang / gzhan du lta ba dang / sgrib pa dang / kun nas ldang ba dang / phung po la mngon par
279b6(mdo sde): zhen pa dang / khams la rlom sems byed pa dang / skye mched la yongs su 'dzin pa dang / yul la chags pa dang / khams gsum la zhen pa dang / bsdus
279b7(mdo sde): ba dang / g.yengs pa dang / gzhan pa dang / 'degs pa dang / shi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / lus la mngon par zhen chag
279b8(mdo sde): ba dang / srog la zhen pa dang / sdug pa yid la byed pa dang / phyin ci log tu gnas pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / mi mthun pa dang / chad par
280a1(mdo sde): bya/ lta ba dang / ther zug tu lta ba dang / 'byung bar lta ba dang / 'jig par lta ba dang / g.yo ba dang / rloms sems dang /
280a2(mdo sde): rtogs pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / bstsogs pa dang / mdud pa dang / kun bzhi dang / nges pa'i bzhi dang / zhen pa dang / khyim gyis gnas la dga' ba
280a3(mdo sde): dang / len pa dang / 'dor ba dang / stong pa nyid kyis sbags pa dang / mtshams med pas g.yang sar 'du shes dang / smon pa med pa la bshed mar 'du shes
280a4(mdo sde): pa dang / dmig su med pa la mngon par 'du shes pa dang / nges par 'byung ba'i khams la kha na ma tho bar lta ba dang / chu bo las rgal bar 'du shes pa dang /
280a5(mdo sde): byang chub kyi phyogs kyis chos la chos ma yin par 'du shes pa dang / yang dag par lta ba la log par lta bar 'du shes pa dang / log par lta ba la yang dag
280a6(mdo sde): par 'du shes pa dang / dge ba'i bshes mnyen la sdig pa'i grogs por 'du shes pa dang / sdig pa'i grogs po la dge ba'i bshes mnyen du 'du shes pa
280a7(mdo sde): dang / sangs rgyas dang mi mthun pa dang / chos spongs pa dang / dge 'dun la ma gus pa dang / dgon pa'i gnas la mngon par mi dga' ba dang / nga rgyal
280a8(mdo sde): dang lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang nga'i snyam pa'i nga rgyal ma spangs pa dang / 'dus byas la bden par 'dzin pa dang / brtson par 'bar bar byed pa dang / bden pa la
280b1(mdo sde): rdzun par 'du shes pa dang / brdzun pa la bden par 'du shes pa dang / 'dod pa la yon tan tu 'du shes pa dang / 'dus byas la bde bar 'du shes pa dang /
280b2(mdo sde): 'khor ba la phan yon rnam pa bcur 'du shes pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la 'jig pa rnam pa bcur 'du shes pa'i chos de lta bu de dag ni dug yin te//
280b3(mdo sde): sdig can de dag ni legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni bdud rtsi bstan pa'o// sang+yas kyi bstan
280b4(mdo sde): pa ni med pa'i bstan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni spros pa bstan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi snyan pa ni ma spang ba'i ston pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni
280b5(mdo sde): kun nas ldang ba med pa bstan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni 'byung ba med pa bstan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni 'thab pa med pas bstan pa'o// /
280b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni brtsod pa med pa bstan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni bdag dang gzhan la mi gdung ba bstan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni
280b7(mdo sde): byams pa dang ldan par bstan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni gnas dang skya bas dang gling dang / dpung gnyen bstan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa ni dul ba
280b8(mdo sde): dang zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi bar bstan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa ni dag pa dang / rnam par dag pa dang / 'od gsal bstan pa'o// sangs
281a1(mdo sde): @/ rgyas kyis bstan pa yang dag pa'i nan tan bstan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa ni shin tu dul ba bstan pa'o// sangs
281a2(mdo sde): rgyas kyis bstan pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa bstan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa ni bstod cing bsngags pa bstan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa ni zhi ba
281a3(mdo sde): dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / shin du nges par bstan pa bstan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba dang yongs su grol bar bstan pa'o// /
281a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa ni phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang mthun pas tshar bcod pa bstan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa ni bdud thams cad 'joms bstan
281a5(mdo sde): pa'o// sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa ni skye ba dang / shi 'pho ba dang / 'byung ba las nges par 'byung ba bstan pa'o// dran pa nye bar bzhag pas dran pa bstan pa'o// /
281a6(mdo sde): sdig pa thams cad mi byed pas yang dag par spong ba bstan pa'o// lus dang sems yang pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bstan pa'o// dad pa sngon du 'gro bas dbang
281a7(mdo sde): po bstan pa'o// nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi mi rdzi bas stobs bstan pa'o// 'thun par khong du chud pas byang chub kyi yan lag bstan pa'o// 'byung bas lam
281a8(mdo sde): bstan pa'o// sems zhi bas zhi nas bstan pa'o// rnam par grol ba bskyed pas/ lhag mthong bstan pa'o/ slu bar mi byed pas bden pa'o// don dang chos dang
281b1(mdo sde): nges pa'i tshig dang slob pa dang / mi 'gal bas so yang dag par rig pa bstan pa'o// 'dus byas la smod pas mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba yongs su brjod pa/
281b2(mdo sde): bstan pa'o// ya mtshan can thams cad spang bas bdag med pa bstan pa'o// mya ngan 'da' bar 'gro bar zhi ba bstan pa'o// pha rol tu 'gro bas pha rol tu phyin pa
281b3(mdo sde): bstan pa'o// sems can yang dag par sdud pas thabs bstan pa'o// zhe 'gras pa'i sems med pas byams pa bstan pa'o// 'tshe ba med pas snying rje bstan pa'o// /
281b4(mdo sde): mi dga' ba sel bas dga' ba bstan pa'o// bya ba byas pas btang snyoms bstan pa'o// nga rgyal med pas ye shes bstan pa'o// byang chub kyis sems bskyed pas
281b5(mdo sde): dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi mchad pa bstan pa'o// yang 'byung ba med pas bde ba thams cad 'thun pa bstan pa'o// bstan pa'i bshad pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe/
281b6(mdo sde): gang bdud sdig can dang lhan cig tu lha'i bu gang dag lags pa de las/ lha'i bu lnga brgya bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// de dag gis
281b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa de lta bu dang mthun par gyur cig ces de skad kyi tshig smras so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'dzum pa mdzad
281b8(mdo sde): kho bos 'dzum pa'i phyir zhus so// zhus nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo bdud kyis sprul pa'i dge slong 'di dag khyod
282a1(mdo sde): kyis mthong ngam/ bcom ldan 'das la kho bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo //
282a2(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis kho bos la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bos phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe lnga brgya tha ma
282a3(mdo sde): lo dam pa'i chos 'jig pa'i tshe/ nga'i bstan pa la dge slong dag phal cher 'di bzhin du sham thabs legs par gyon pa/ bla gos legs par ma gyon pa/ gos
282a4(mdo sde): btul te gyon pa/ lhung bzed chags pa/ shes bzhin med pa/ spyod lam mi sdug pa/ lag na mkhar ba thogs pa/ sna leb leb po dang / zhar ba dang /
282a5(mdo sde): 'theng po dang / zha bo dang / lus sha tshugs ma lags pa dang / nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa dag byung bar gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo 'di ltar
282a6(mdo sde): de'i tshe dge slong dag pa la bsnyen bkur la ched cher bar byed pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur bsti la sten pa dang / bya ba sna tshogs kyi mi khom pas srel ba dang /
282a7(mdo sde): 'dul bar bor ba dang / so sor thar pa dral ba dang / 'tshams las 'da' ba dang / tshe 'di ched che bar byed pa dang / tshe rabs gzhan ched mi che bar byed par 'gyur
282a8(mdo sde): te/ de dag ni 'di lta ste/ chos kyi phyir ni ma yin gyi/ bsnyen bkur gyi phyir nar ba dang / 'theng po dang / zha bo dang / lus kyi sha tshugs ma lags dang / nad
282b1(mdo sde): sna tshogs kyi btab pa 'ongs shing / lhags ma rnams rab tu 'byung bar byed do// snyen pa rdzogs par byed do// kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i des na nga'i bstan pa
282b2(mdo sde): 'di ltar mi rung ba dang / mnyan du mi rung bar 'gyur ro// lha rnams kyang mi dga' bar 'gyur ro// bdud rnams yid rangs shing dga' dang / btang snyomasu 'gyur ro// /
282b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la kho bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdud sdig can rnams yid rangs shing / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms su
282b4(mdo sde): 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo 'di ltar skyes bu blun po de dag bdag nyid bdud kyis las byed par 'gyur te/ de la bar chad bya ba'i
282b5(mdo sde): phyir/ phyir zhing bdud sdig can brtson par mi 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdud sdig can mi brtson pa rnams la glags mi 'tshol gyi/ bdud sdig can
282b6(mdo sde): ni dge slong gang yang 'byung ba med par bya ba'i phyir mgo dang / gos dang me 'bar ba bzhin du brtson par gnas pa de dag la bdud glags tshol to// kun dga' bo lta ba ma
282b7(mdo sde): thob par bya ba dang / ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba dang / mngon du ma byas pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir sbyor bar shos shig/ brtsal bar byos shig/ 'bed par byos shig/
282b8(mdo sde): bdud kyi phyogs tshar chod cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'bar bar byos shig dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung shig/ nga la chos kyis mchod pas mchod cig/
283a1(mdo sde): 'di ni khyed la rjes su bstan pa yin no// bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ dge slong lnga stong gis tshe'i 'du
283a2(mdo sde): byed spangs par gyur te/ bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa mthong bar ma gyur cig/ ces de skad kyis tshig smras nas/
283a3(mdo sde): de dag steng gis bar snang la mngon par 'phags te/ rang gis me'i khams kyis bdag nyid bsregs so// lha'i bu 'bum gyis kyang de dag la mchod pa byas par
283a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// dge slong nyis brgya ni chos la chos kyis mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ dge slong nyis brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams la sems
283a5(mdo sde): rnam par grol lo// byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong
283a6(mdo sde): ba dag kyang 'khor dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis
283a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig par ma mthong bar bgyi ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gis rna lam du grangs
283a8(mdo sde): ba de dag nams kyang sems le lo dri mas kun nas mi gnas par bgyi ba dang / de dag bdud kyi las byung ba rnams kyi dbang du mi 'gyur bar/ bcom ldan 'das sku'i
283b1(mdo sde): tshe ring du bzhugs shing bskyang bar gsol zhes smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa dang / chos
283b2(mdo sde): bstan pa rnam par 'phrul pa bas/ gang kho bos phyogs tsam zhig sngon sum du gyur pa de ni de lta bu dag yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos/ tshe dang
283b3(mdo sde): ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu kho bos kyang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis cho 'phrul kha cig mngon sum
283b4(mdo sde): du gyur to// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu kho bos mngon par shes te/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ ring po ma lon/ kho bos yang rab
283b5(mdo sde): tu byung nas ring po ma lon pa zhig na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen srog shing gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing na bcom
283b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das la lta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir dang po 'ongs par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyang mnyan yod kyi rgyal bu rgyal
283b7(mdo sde): byed kyi 'tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyis kun dga' bo 'dir gnas par dam mdzad do// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'ang der dbyar zla ba gsum par dam
283b8(mdo sde): bcas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan mnga' dang / dge 'dun gyis nang dang / bkad sa dang / gso sbyong dang / phyag 'tshal ba'i las la kho bo cag gis phyis
284a1(mdo sde): nam yang mthong bar gyur to// de nas zla gsum zeng de 'das pa dang / gso sbyong dang / dgag dbye'i tshe/
284a2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bzhin bstan to// de la kho bos 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod dbyar gyi zla ba gsum gyi tshe gang na 'dug
284a3(mdo sde): 'dug/ des smras pa/ btsun pa 'od bsrungs chen po mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po 'di nyid na/ rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis btsun mo'i nang na'o// de la kheb
284a4(mdo sde): 'di snyam du gyur te/ sems can 'di lta bu lhung ba dang / bcas pa dang / yongs su dag pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun dang lhan cig dgag dbye bar mi rung
284a5(mdo sde): ngo/ snyam du gyur nas/ kho bo 'khor gyis khyams de nas byung ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa skud pa'i 'gan 'de rdungaso// der bcom ldan 'das
284a6(mdo sde): kyi 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal gnas rten 'od bsrungs chen po ci'i phyir 'gen 'di rdungs pa bsoms
284a7(mdo sde): shig/ des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bas na bdag bskrad pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal khyod ma
284a8(mdo sde): dad pa chen po byed par mi 'gyur bar bdag nyid tshangs par byos shig/ rang gi spyod yul ston cig/ nyan thos chen po rnams 'gu bar byos shig/ de nas
284b1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs
284b2(mdo sde): so// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe phyogs ban+da na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i rlung gi
284b3(mdo sde): bye ma snyed na sbyangs pa'i yon tan/ smra ba'i dge slong 'od srung chen po 'dra ba sha stag/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gyur smad pa'i phyir 'gen 'de rdungs par snang
284b4(mdo sde): bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyi kho bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srung ci'i phyir 'gen 'di brdung / bcom ldan 'das la kho bos 'di skad ces
284b5(mdo sde): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de dbyar zla gsum du btsun mo'i 'khor du gnas nas/ yongs su dga' ba dge 'dun dang lhan
284b6(mdo sde): cig dgag dbye bgyid par 'tshal te/ de skud pa'i slad du bdag 'gen 'di rdung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku thad nas 'od phyung ste/ kho bo la 'di skad
284b7(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal nas/ 'od srung phyogs bcu na ci snang ba ji ltos shig/ kho bos de'i tshe/ bstas nas phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyis khams tshad med grangs
284b8(mdo sde): med pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na gnas rten bdag 'dra ba sha stag/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bskrad pa'i phyir 'gen 'di brdung bar mthong ngo // 'jig
285a1(mdo sde): rten gyi khams thams cad na yang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis zhabs kyi
285a2(mdo sde): drung na 'dug pa mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyi kho bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srung chen po khyod ci 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang nga'i mdun na
285a3(mdo sde): 'dug pa 'di 'am/ 'on te gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyis khams tshad med pa na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung na 'dug pa 'am/ gang skad
285a4(mdo sde): par 'dod/ de'i tshe kho bo ngo tsha ba'i tshul gyi 'gen 'des la dor snyam na dor yang ma nus nas/ rgyun ma chad par sgra byung ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na ji lta ba bzhin
285a5(mdo sde): du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na'ang chad pa med pa/ lhag pa med pa/ skyes pa med pa de bzhin du byed par snang ngo // kho bos de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs
285a6(mdo sde): gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni shes pa phyogs cig pa ldan pa ste/ byang chub sems
285a7(mdo sde): dpa' yul chud ma mchis pa rnams kyis spyod yul ma 'chal nas/ 'gen 'de brdungs pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bzod par gsol lo// bcom ldan
285a8(mdo sde): 'das kyis kho bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srung chen po khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di snyed mthong ba thams cad du/
285b1(mdo sde): khyim pa'i khyim thams cad du/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir dbyar zla ba gsum du gnas so// 'od srung chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di/
285b2(mdo sde): mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po 'dir/ btsun mo'i 'khor du dbyangs gnas pa dam bcas pa kyang / rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi btsun mo'i 'khor las/ bud med lnga
285b3(mdo sde): brgya bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par yongs su smin par byas so// skyes pa lnga brgya dang / khye'u lnga brgya dang / smad 'tshong ma lnga
285b4(mdo sde): brgya yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bzhag go/ sems can mang po de dag kyang nyan thos kyi theg par btul te/ mtho ris su
285b5(mdo sde): 'gro bar byas so// bcom ldan 'das la kho bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos ji lta bu zhig bshad pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sems
285b6(mdo sde): can de snyed cig yongs su smin par bgyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de nyid la chos ji lta bu zhig
285b7(mdo sde): bshad pa sems can ji snyed yongs su smin par byas shing khyod kyis dris shig dang / de nyid khyod la len lon par 'gyur ro// kho bos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la
285b8(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod kyis chos ji lta bu zhig bshad pas sems can de snyed yongs su smin par byas/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// btsun pa
286a1(mdo sde): 'od srung chen po sems can de dag ni chos bshad pas yongs su smin par mi 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa
286a2(mdo sde): 'od srung sems can gang dag dga' ba'i rtsed mos yongs su smin par 'gyur ba yang yod do// rab tu bzung ba dang / tshar bcad pa dang / sbyin pa rab tu sbyin pa dang / phong
286a3(mdo sde): shing dbul ba dang / bkod pa chen po// kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / brgya byin gyis gzugs
286a4(mdo sde): dang / 'jig pas sdig pa dang / tshig btsu pa po dang / tshig 'jam po dang / phan gdags pas yongs su smin par 'gyur ba yod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa 'od
286a5(mdo sde): srung chen po sems can gyi spyod pa ni sna tshogs pa ste/ de dag bya ba yang sna tshogs pa nyid kyis yongs su smin par 'gyur te/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po de ltar yongs su
286a6(mdo sde): smon pa'i sems rnams// phyis chos bshad pas shin tu dul bar 'gyur ro// de la kho bos 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod kyi sems can gyis khams ji
286a7(mdo sde): snyed cig spyod pa 'dis yongs su smin par byas/ des smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po chos kyis dbyings dang ji snyed pa'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyin
286a8(mdo sde): kyang ji snyed/ smras pa/ na mkha' ji tsam pa'o// smras pa/ na mkha'i khams kyang ji tsam/ smras pa/ sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa ste/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po
286b1(mdo sde): de ltar na chos kyi dbyings dang na mkha'i khams dang / sems can gyi khams kyi ni gnyis su med gnyis su dbyer med do// de la kho bos 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam
286b2(mdo sde): dpal ji ltar sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa med na/ 'o na sangs rgyas 'byung ba don med par mi 'gyur ram/ des smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung
286b3(mdo sde): chen po dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig 'khris pa'i rigs kyis btab te/ rnam pa sna tshogs su bla bar gyur pa dang / de la kha cig skyes bu 'di ni gdon gyis btab
286b4(mdo sde): po snyam du gyur to// de nas smram pa mkhas shig 'ongs te/ skyes bu de la mar blud pa la stsogs pa byas pas/ khris pa'i rigs de zhi bar byas nas/ de phyis
286b5(mdo sde): rnam pa sna tshogs su mi bla bar gyur na/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po ji snyam du sems/ de las lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin byung bar gyur pa yod dam/ de la kho bos
286b6(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/ 'on kyang mar mar blud pa la stsogs pa'i mkhris pa de zhi bar gyur to// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
286b7(mdo sde): btsun pa 'od srung chen po skyes bu de la sman pa chen po byas pa ma yin nam/ kho bos de la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal ji skad smras pa de bzhin no// btsun
286b8(mdo sde): pa 'od srung chen po de bzhin du 'jig rten gnas pa phyin ci log gis rigs kyis btab pa dag/ bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes shing / bdag med la bdag
287a1(mdo sde): bya/ tu mngon par zhen nas 'khor ba na 'khor ro// de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa dag
287a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten du byung ste/ dpe bstan pa dang / de dag gis bdag tu 'du shes pa yongs su shes pa dang / phyin ci log spangs par bya ba'i phyir sems can de dag
287a3(mdo sde): la chos 'chad do// de dag chos thos nas 'du shes thams cad dang bral zhing / phyi phyir zhing mngon par mi chags te/ de dag bdag tu 'du shes pa spangs nas/
287a4(mdo sde): chu bo las rgal te/ de dag rgal ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o// btsun pa 'od srung chen po
287a5(mdo sde): 'di snyam du sems/ de la bdag gam/ sems can nam srog gam/ skye bo 'am/ gang zag gang yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa yod dam/ kho bos de
287a6(mdo sde): la smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/ 'on kyang mnyam pa nyid yang dag par bstan pas phyin ci log spong ngo // 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa
287a7(mdo sde): 'od srung chen po 'di lta bu'i phyir sangs rgyas 'byung ste/ mnyam pa nyid yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir te/ skye ba'i phyir ma yin/ 'gag pa'i phyir ma yin gyi/ kun
287a8(mdo sde): nas nyon mongs pa med pa 'ba' shig rtogs par bya ba'i phyir kho bos 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang dag rang bzhin de lta bu'i
287b1(mdo sde): gang chos kyis dbyings la'ang rtog cing sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i go cha yang mi 'dor la/ zhum par mi 'gyur zhing / rang bzhin gyis yod
287b2(mdo sde): su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sems can rnams kyis phyir go cha bgos pa ni dka' byed pa ma yin no// des smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po de ltar byang chub
287b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po dgos pa yin no// de la kho bos 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod byang chub sems dpa'i go cha
287b4(mdo sde): brtsams par spobs par gyis shig/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po byang chub sems dpa'i go cha chen po ni sum bcu rtsa gnyis te/ go
287b5(mdo sde): cha de dag dgos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i sprad pa spyod do// sum bcu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po rmi lam gyi
287b6(mdo sde): rang bzhin gyis mtshan nyid kyis 'khor ba tshad med pas yongs su 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o// bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis sems can tshad
287b7(mdo sde): med pa yongs su smin par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o// chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid kyi sangs rgyas tshad med pa la mchod pa dang / rim gro byed pa ni byang chub
287b8(mdo sde): sems dpa'i go cha'o// brag cha dang mnyam pa nyid kyis mtshan nyid kyis/ sangs rgyas kyis gsungs thams cad nyan cing 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o// /
288a1(mdo sde): chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'dul ba'i mtshan nyid kyis/ sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad bsrungs pa ni/ byang
288a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i go cha'o// nyon mongs pa thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i mtshan nyid kyis bdud thams cad 'dul ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i go
288a3(mdo sde): cha'o// yod pa dang / med pa'i sel ba'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid kyis/ phas kyis rgol ba thams cad chos dang 'thun
288a4(mdo sde): bas tshar bcod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o// phung po thams cad spong ba'i mtshan nyid kyis/ bdog pa thams cad gtong ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i
288a5(mdo sde): go cha'o// mngon par 'du bya ba'i med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis/ tshul khrims dang / bslab pa dang / sbyang ba'i yon tan gyis yo byad bsnyung ba thams cad yang dag par
288a6(mdo sde): len pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i go tshe'o// khong khro med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis/ bzod pa dang dul ba dang / nges pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o// lus
288a7(mdo sde): dang sems dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyis blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa'i brtson 'grus ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o// rten thams cad dben pa'i mtshan
288a8(mdo sde): nyid kyis bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o// ma rig pa'i
288b1(mdo sde): gti mug gis blta ba yongs su dag pa'i mtshan nyid kyis/ thogs pa med pa'i shes rab kyis pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o// bya ba thams
288b2(mdo sde): cad ston pa'i mtshan nyid kyis thabs chen po ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o// zhe 'gras pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis byams pa chen po ni byang chub sems dpa'i
288b3(mdo sde): go cha'o// sor mo lnga na mkha' dang mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid kyis snying rje chen po ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o// yongs su mi skyo ba'i mtshan nyid kyis dga'
288b4(mdo sde): ba chen po ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o// bde ba dang sdug bsngal bar mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyis gtang snyoms chen po ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/
288b5(mdo sde): rnam par grol ba lag thil du 'ongs kyang thob par mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyis bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i mtshan nyid ni byang chub
